NK050(wi)006:1: // me g+ha swa ra n+aa ma y+aa no t+tam g+ha
NK050(wi)006:2: r+b+ha +aa r+tha bi n+nam bi ha ra ti sma
NK050(wi)006:4: // / theg mchog snying po'i don la dpyad pa dbyar rnga'i sgra gsang zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK050(wi)006:5: na ma sarba gu ru d+hi de ba b+h+yah rang bzhin 'od gsal gnyis med rdo rje'i khams //
NK050(wi)006:6: rdul bral mngon byang chub nas chos 'khor gyis //
NK050(wi)006:7: bdud 'dul 'phags pa'i tshogs la dbang bsgyur ba //
NK050(wi)006:8: thub dbang rin chen mchog la gus phyag 'tshal //
NK050(wi)006:9: rgyal ba de dang dgongs pa mi gnyis kyang //
NK050(wi)006:10: rnam pa rdo rje slob dpon tshul ston pa //
NK050(wi)006:11: 'jig rten gsum na snang srid zil gnon ces //
NK050(wi)006:12: grags chen sangs rgyas gnyis pa de la 'dud //
NK050(wi)006:13: gang thugs 'od rdul phra mos kyang //
NK050(wi)006:14: rmongs pa'i rgya mtsho skem pa dang //
NK050(wi)006:15: zab gsang nor mchog snang mdzad pa //
NK050(wi)006:16: 'jam dpal nyin byed dbang po rje //
NK050(wi)006:17: rgyal tshab mkhyen rab mi pham rgyal //
NK050(wi)006:18: grags snyan yid 'ong mtsho ltan mas //
NK050(wi)006:20: bdag cag rnam kun shis par mdzod //
NK050(wi)006:21: rtog las mi rtog ye shes mes //
NK050(wi)006:22: dngos kun rang tshugs zhig pa'i 'od //
NK050(wi)006:23: srog dang bcas pa'i zeg ma tsam //
NK050(wi)006:24: rtog ge'i tshang tshing nags su song //
NK050(wi)006:25: 'dir rgyal ba byams mgon rin po che'i chos 'khor
NK050(wi)006:26: gsum pa'i dgongs 'grel bstan bcos chen po rgyud bla
NK050(wi)006:27: ma'i dbu zhabs kyi lus las don ni rdo rje'i
NK050(wi)006:28: gnas bdun te / 'di dag so so rang rig
NK050(wi)006:29: pa'i ye shes las gzhan thos bsam gyi shes pas
NK050(wi)006:30: ji bzhin gcod par dka' ba'i phyir rdo rje zhes
NK050(wi)006:31: gnas bdun te / brjod do // de la rdo
NK050(wi)006:32: rje'i gnas bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po
NK050(wi)006:33: ni 'grib pa med pa dang 'phel ba med pa
NK050(wi)006:34: bstan pa'i mdo las gsungs te /
NK050(wi)006:35: sh+aa ri'i bu don dam pa zhes bya ba 'di
NK050(wi)006:36: ni sems can gyi khams kyi tshig bla dwags so
NK050(wi)006:38: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang chos
NK050(wi)006:39: kyi sku'i tshig bla dwags so zhes brda sprod par
NK050(wi)006:41: dag pa dwangs pa 'od gsal ba //
NK050(wi)006:43: bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po ste //
NK050(wi)006:44: ye nas gnas pa'i chos nyid do //
NK050(wi)006:46: don dam pa la dgongs nas snying por bstan pa
NK050(wi)006:47: sogs chos 'khor gnyis pa'i dus su mang du gsungs
NK050(wi)006:48: pa skabs kyi gdul bya so so'i blo dang mtshams
NK050(wi)006:51: chos sku rnam gnyis shes bya ste //
NK050(wi)006:52: chos dbyings shin tu dri med dang //
NK050(wi)006:53: zhes dbyings rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa la chos sku zhes gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK050(wi)006:55: thog ma med pa'i dus kyi khams //
NK050(wi)006:56: chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin te //
NK050(wi)006:57: de yod pas na 'gro ba kun //
NK050(wi)006:58: mya ngan 'das pa thob pa yin //
NK050(wi)006:61: sgrub pa yi ni rten gyur pa //
NK050(wi)006:62: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang //
NK050(wi)006:65: zhes ka ya'i sgras dbyings de bem stong ma yin
NK050(wi)006:66: par zag med kyi chos du ma'i 'byung gnas sam
NK050(wi)006:67: rten du gnas par gsungs pa ni tha snyad kyi
NK050(wi)006:69: de la rnam dbyer bcas pa'i mtshan nyid can //
NK050(wi)006:70: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don la dpyad pa dang /
NK050(wi)006:71: rgyu mtshan gsum gyis snying po'i don bstan pa dngos la dpyad pa dang gnyis /
NK050(wi)006:72: dang po la gzhan gyi lugs bshad pa dang /
NK050(wi)006:73: rang gi lugs bshad pa dang gnyis las dang po ni /
NK050(wi)006:74: 'di la rgya bod kyi mkhas pa so so rjes
NK050(wi)006:75: 'brang dang bcas kyis 'chad tshul mi 'dra ba mang
NK050(wi)006:77: chos 'khor rnam pa gsum ka'i nges don ji snyed pa rnams bdag med gnyis su 'du la /
NK050(wi)006:78: khams kyi ngo bo la dpyad na gang zag dang
NK050(wi)006:79: chos kyi bdag gam gzung 'dzin gnyis kyis stong par
NK050(wi)006:80: bzhed / stong tshul yang slob dpon gzhan gyis bzhed
NK050(wi)006:81: pa ltar med par dgag pa tsam ma yin par
NK050(wi)006:82: bzhed / dbus mtha' las / gang zag dang ni chos rnams kyi //
NK050(wi)006:83: dngos po med 'dir stong pa nyid //
NK050(wi)006:84: de dngos med pa'i dngos yod pa //
NK050(wi)006:85: de nyid de la stong pa nyid //
NK050(wi)006:86: ces gsungs pa ltar ma yin dgag gi stong tshul
NK050(wi)006:87: gnyis stong gi shes pa rang rig rang gsal la
NK050(wi)006:88: bder gshegs snying po zhes ston par bzhed /
NK050(wi)006:89: de la nges pa'i don gyi rdo rje zhes gsungs /
NK050(wi)006:90: rjes dpag tshad mas rnyed pa'i med par dgag pa
NK050(wi)006:91: rnam grangs kyi stong nyid la snying por 'dod pa
NK050(wi)006:93: sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba la snying por bshad pa ni /
NK050(wi)006:99: byang chub sems 'grel sogs nas gsal rgyas bstan no //
NK050(wi)006:100: kun gzhi'i rnam shes la snying por bshad pa ni lang gshegs /
NK050(wi)006:103: rdo rje gur la sogs pa nas mang du gsungs pa ltar ro //
NK050(wi)006:105: len pa'i rnam par shes pa zab cing phra //
NK050(wi)006:106: sa bon thams cad chu bo'i rgyun bzhin 'bab //
NK050(wi)006:107: bdag tu rtog pa gyur na mi rung zhes //
NK050(wi)006:108: 'di ni byis pa rnams la yongs ma bstan //
NK050(wi)006:110: sems tsam gyis slob dpon rnams kyi sgra ci bzhin par zhal gyis bzhes par mdzad do //
NK050(wi)006:111: bod kyi mkhas mchog kha cig /
NK050(wi)006:112: snying po'i don mtha' bral du gtan la phab nas zung 'jug tu nyams su len zhes bzhed /
NK050(wi)006:113: de'i srol 'dzin rnams la dbu ma gzhan stong pa zhes kyang grags so //
NK050(wi)006:114: kun mkhyen rong ston chen po dbyings rig dbyer med la snying por bzhed do //
NK050(wi)006:115: skyes mchog 'di ni rgyal ba byams mgon nyid rang
NK050(wi)006:116: gi bstan bcos rnams 'grel pa'i phyir bsam bzhin byon
NK050(wi)006:117: te mthar rong byams chen sku la thim zhes lo
NK050(wi)006:119: gnyis pa rang lugs bshad pa ni /
NK050(wi)006:120: 'dir ltar bu gnas lugs zab mo rtogs shing sgom
NK050(wi)006:121: pa la lung rig man ngag dang ldan dgos pa
NK050(wi)006:123: sam b+hu ti 'am yang dag par sbyor ba las /
NK050(wi)006:124: bstan bcos tshad ma slob dpon dang //
NK050(wi)006:125: lung gis rjes 'brang de nyid rig /
NK050(wi)006:126: gsang don de nyid dngos po yang //
NK050(wi)006:127: gcig nas gcig rgyud shes par bya //
NK050(wi)006:129: don dam lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni //
NK050(wi)006:130: tshogs bsags sgrib pa dag pa'i lag rjes dang //
NK050(wi)006:131: rtogs ldan bla ma'i byin rlab kho na las //
NK050(wi)006:132: thabs gzhan brten pa'i rmongs rnams rnyed par dka' //
NK050(wi)006:134: lung rig man ngag gis rgyud smin pa'i skal ldan
NK050(wi)006:135: gzu bor gnas pa'i blo can rnams ni 'di ltar
NK050(wi)006:136: bzhed de / rnam dbyer bcas pa'i sogs rkang pa
NK050(wi)006:137: bzhi'i don khams kyi ngo bo ye nas bden stong
NK050(wi)006:138: du gnas pa don dam dpyod pa'i blos spros bral
NK050(wi)006:140: don la mi gnas pa bdag gnyis su 'dzin pa
NK050(wi)006:141: 'khrul sems ma rig pas bslad pa glo bur ba
NK050(wi)006:142: sprin lta bu de yang gshis 'od gsal la dbyer
NK050(wi)006:143: yod cing 'bral du rung ba des khams stong ngo
NK050(wi)006:144: zhes ngo bo la ma gos par bstan pas sgro
NK050(wi)006:146: dbyings rang byung gi ye shes nyid don la ye
NK050(wi)006:147: nas lhan cig dbye ba med par gnas pa sangs
NK050(wi)006:148: rgyas kyi chos stobs sogs yon tan mtha' yas pa
NK050(wi)006:149: nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu des khams mi stong
NK050(wi)006:150: ngo zhes skur 'debs kyi mtha' sel ba ste /
NK050(wi)006:151: nges don mtha' bral dbu ma chen po'i mtshan nyid
NK050(wi)006:152: phyin ci ma log par bstan pa ni tha snyad
NK050(wi)006:153: rten 'brel gyi dbang du byas pa ste gdul bya
NK050(wi)006:154: mchog gi skal pa'i khyad par du mdzad do //
NK050(wi)006:155: sgom don gyi dbang du mdzad pa ni /
NK050(wi)006:156: 'di la bsal bya sogs rkang pa bzhi'i don /
NK050(wi)006:157: rgyu mtshan de bas na khams 'di la kun nyon
NK050(wi)006:158: 'phral byung gi dri ma rnams rang bzhin med cing
NK050(wi)006:159: gshis la ma zhugs pas da gzod gsal du bsal
NK050(wi)006:160: bar bya ba ci yang med do //
NK050(wi)006:161: rnam byang gi yon tan thams cad chos nyid kyi
NK050(wi)006:162: gdangs 'gag pa med pa me'i tsha ba ltar rang
NK050(wi)006:163: chas su yod pa snying po 'dus ma byas pa'i
NK050(wi)006:164: ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang ro gcig pa'i phyir
NK050(wi)006:165: / da gzod gsal du bzhag par bya ba cung zad med do //
NK050(wi)006:166: de ltar bsal bzhag med pa'i chos nyid yang dag
NK050(wi)006:167: pa'i don la 'dzin rtog bral ba'i ye shes kyis
NK050(wi)006:168: phyin ci ma log par yang dag par blta ste
NK050(wi)006:169: / nang gi dam pa chos sku ni //
NK050(wi)006:170: ye shes mig gis rig par 'gyur //
NK050(wi)006:171: zhes gsungs pas lta ba'i gnas lugs zab mo de
NK050(wi)006:172: mthong ba med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par mthong
NK050(wi)006:173: na rnam par grol bar 'gyur te /
NK050(wi)006:174: gdod ma'i grol gzhi mthar thug pa yin zhing grol
NK050(wi)006:175: 'bras chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang dbyer med
NK050(wi)006:176: pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku 'grub par 'gyur ba'i
NK050(wi)006:177: phyir ro // de la tshul gcig pa'i chos kyi
NK050(wi)006:178: dbyings dang tha mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi sgo
NK050(wi)006:179: phyir ro // zhes gsungs so // des na mdo
NK050(wi)006:180: rgyud kun gyi gnad don mthar thug kun khyab bde
NK050(wi)006:181: gshegs snying po brjod bya don gyi rgyud rang byung
NK050(wi)006:182: gi ye shes nyid skabs 'dir gsal bor ston pas
NK050(wi)006:183: gzhung la'ang rgyud bla ma zhes mtshan btags pa ste
NK050(wi)006:184: phyir ro // zhes gsungs so // / phyogs kyi glang pos /
NK050(wi)006:185: shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis med //
NK050(wi)006:186: ye shes de ni de bzhin gshegs //
NK050(wi)006:187: bsgrub bya de don sbyor ba yis //
NK050(wi)006:188: gzhung dang lam yang de sgra yin //
NK050(wi)006:190: 'di mdo sngags kyi mtshams sbyor yin pas 'dir bstan pa rnams sgra ji bzhin du 'dod dgos so //
NK050(wi)006:191: dper na dmigs pa che ba sogs thegs chen gyi
NK050(wi)006:192: khyad chos bdun po stong nyid snying rje gnyis su
NK050(wi)006:193: 'du zhing mdo sngags gnyis ka'i thun mong du bshad
NK050(wi)006:194: pa bzhin no // 'khor lo dang por bstan pa'i gang zag gi bdag med pa dang /
NK050(wi)006:195: bar ba'i skabs su chos kyi bdag med par bstan pa rnams nges don phyogs re yin zhing /
NK050(wi)006:196: tha ma'i skabs su snying po bstan pa'i mdo rnams
NK050(wi)006:197: su yod med legs par phyes nas mthar bral gyi
NK050(wi)006:198: ye shes nyid nges don mthar thug phyir mi ldog
NK050(wi)006:201: dper na sa bon las myu gu dang 'o ma zho yod med kyi dpe las /
NK050(wi)006:202: sems can la'ang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yod ces smras na ni zhen par 'gyur la /
NK050(wi)006:203: med ces smras na ni rdzun du 'gyur ro gsungs pa rtag chad du 'gyur ba'i don te /
NK050(wi)006:204: yod pa tha snyad dang med pa bden dngos med
NK050(wi)006:205: pa'i don du go dgos kyi gzhan du grangs can
NK050(wi)006:207: de'i phyir 'khor lo tha ma'i brjod bya zab mo
NK050(wi)006:208: rnams theg pa mtha' dag gis rgyud sbyangs pa'i byang
NK050(wi)006:209: sems dbang rnon rnams la ched du gdams pa ste
NK050(wi)006:210: / sangs rgyas nyid kyi dgongs pa nyid kyis 'grel
NK050(wi)006:211: ba'i mdo dgongs 'grel las sngar ni bla na yod
NK050(wi)006:212: pa rtsod pa dang bcas pa 'dir ni bla na
NK050(wi)006:213: med pa rtsod pa med pa sogs gsungs pas snying
NK050(wi)006:214: po bstan pa'i mdo rnams nges don rtsod med yin
NK050(wi)006:215: / par gsal lo // de bzhin du sor mo'i phreng ba'i mdo la sogs pa dang /
NK050(wi)006:216: rnga bo che'i mdo las 'di ltar gsungs te /
NK050(wi)006:218: bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po la yang stong
NK050(wi)006:219: pa nyid kyi don ston pa'i mdo mang du mchis
NK050(wi)006:220: lags so // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK050(wi)006:221: stong pa nyid ston pa gang ci yang rung ba
NK050(wi)006:222: de thams cad ni dgongs pa can du rig par
NK050(wi)006:223: bya la / bla na med pa'i mdo 'di lta
NK050(wi)006:224: bu 'di dag ni dgongs pa can ma yin pa
NK050(wi)006:225: bya la / rig bya'o // zhes mdo 'di myang 'das sogs dang brjod bya 'dra'o //
NK050(wi)006:226: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las drangs nges kyi dbye ba brgyad pa bshad pa las /
NK050(wi)006:227: kun rdzob sgrub byed drang don /
NK050(wi)006:228: don dam sgrub byed nges don /
NK050(wi)006:230: zab cing rtogs dka' nges don /
NK050(wi)006:232: 'khor lo tha mas bstan don 'di kho na nges don no //
NK050(wi)006:233: de la skabs 'dir mi 'gyur ba'i chos sku /
NK050(wi)006:236: don dam pa'i yon tan sogs gdod nas rang chas
NK050(wi)006:237: su bzhugs pa'i grub mtha' thun mong ma yin pa
NK050(wi)006:238: rnams rtsal du bton nas gsungs so //
NK050(wi)006:239: des na slob dpon thogs med rjes 'brang bcas kyis
NK050(wi)006:240: bzhed pa ltar 'khor lo tha ma nges don mthar
NK050(wi)006:242: slob dpon 'di drangs nges 'byed pa por rdo rje'i lung gis zin pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)006:244: thogs med ces bya'i dge slong ni //
NK050(wi)006:245: bstan bcos de yi don la mkhas //
NK050(wi)006:246: mdo sde nges don drangs ba'i don //
NK050(wi)006:247: rnam pa mang po rab tu 'byed //
NK050(wi)006:250: stong pa bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa ltar //
NK050(wi)006:251: nges don mdo sde dag gi bye brag shes //
NK050(wi)006:252: gang la sems can skyes bu gang zag bstan //
NK050(wi)006:253: chos de thams cad drang ba'i don du shes //
NK050(wi)006:254: zhes gsungs pa'i don ni snying po'i ngo bo yang
NK050(wi)006:255: stong pa nyid las ma 'das shing sems can skyes
NK050(wi)006:256: bu gang zag sogs ni 'khor lo dang po bdag
NK050(wi)006:257: ston pa lta bu rnams drang don du shes dgos
NK050(wi)006:258: pa'i don no // bka' bar mtha'i brjod bya stong
NK050(wi)006:259: pa nyid la snying po dang snying po nyid yon
NK050(wi)006:260: tan gyis mi stong bar bstan pa rnams bden gnyis
NK050(wi)006:261: dbyer med du gnas par 'thad pas /
NK050(wi)006:262: 'phags pa klu thogs gnyis kyi dgongs pa yang 'gal med du shes dgos te /
NK050(wi)006:263: gzhan du na chos dang gang zag la sgro skur gyi nyes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
NK050(wi)006:264: gzhi la ye shes 'jog pa sngags kyi khyad chos yinapasa mdo lam du de mi 'thad snyam na /
NK050(wi)006:265: sngags kyi zab don rnams mdo'i sbas don yin pas rtsal du bton nas bshad pa med kyang /
NK050(wi)006:267: sems rtogs na ye shes yin pas na //
NK050(wi)006:269: sems kyi rang bzhin shes pas na //
NK050(wi)006:271: sems dang sems nyid ces sogs mang du yod pas 'gal ba med do //
NK050(wi)006:272: legs sbyar skad du snying po la gar+b+ha'i sgra yod pas shun pas g.yogs pa'i snying po dang /
NK050(wi)006:273: s+thi ra'am swa ra'i sgra brtan pa la 'jug pas
NK050(wi)006:274: dri bcas kyi snying po de glo bur gyi sgrib
NK050(wi)006:275: pa'i dbus na brtan par yod pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)006:276: sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal gang yin pa //
NK050(wi)006:277: de ni nam mkha' bzhin du 'gyur med do //
NK050(wi)006:280: nam mkha' ji srid mi 'jig pa //
NK050(wi)006:281: nam mkha' ji srid de srid sems //
NK050(wi)006:283: hri da ya'i sgra bcud dam mchog la 'jug pas
NK050(wi)006:284: de bzhin nyid de chos kun gyi bcud dam mchog
NK050(wi)006:287: gang gis chos kyi gtso bo mchog /
NK050(wi)006:288: sems kyi gsang 'di ma shes na //
NK050(wi)006:291: zab zhi spros bral 'od gsal 'dus ma byas //
NK050(wi)006:292: bdud rtsi lta bu'i chos shig bdag gis rnyed //
NK050(wi)006:294: de lta bu zab mo'i chos kyi tshul gcig pu de la ming gis brda mang du bstan te /
NK050(wi)006:305: stong pa nyid la sogs pa dang /
NK050(wi)006:306: sngags kyi thegs par dang po'i mgon po /
NK050(wi)006:307: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes /
NK050(wi)006:310: mkha' khyab mkha' yi rdo rje /
NK050(wi)006:313: lhag pa'i don dam bden pa /
NK050(wi)006:315: phyag rgya chen po sogs mang du yod do //
NK050(wi)006:316: gnyis pa rgyu mtshan gsum gyis snying po'i don bstan pa dngos la /
NK050(wi)006:319: 'thad pa la rtsod pa spang ba'o //
NK050(wi)006:321: 'dir ngo bo stong pa dang rang bzhin yon tan
NK050(wi)006:322: ye ldan gyi snying po 'gro rgyun na bzhugs pa'i
NK050(wi)006:323: sgrub byed ni / rdzogs sangs sku ni sogs dang /
NK050(wi)006:325: sangs rgyas ye shes sems can tshogs zhugs phyir //
NK050(wi)006:326: rang bzhin dri med de ni gnyis med la //
NK050(wi)006:327: sangs rgyas rigs la de 'bras nyer btags pas //
NK050(wi)006:328: 'gro kun sangs rgyas snying po can du bstan //
NK050(wi)006:329: ces pa'i shwa lo ka gnyis kyi rkang pa dang po gnyis dang gnyis pa gnyis te /
NK050(wi)006:330: bzhi kas rang bzhin gnas rigs bstan te /
NK050(wi)006:331: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chos sku 'dus
NK050(wi)006:332: ma byas yon tan kun dang ldan pa de phyis
NK050(wi)006:333: dri ma dang bral ba'i tshe gang zag rang gi
NK050(wi)006:334: rgyud nas bum pa bcag pa'i nang gi mar me
NK050(wi)006:335: gsal ba'am / sprin dang bral ba'i nyin 'od 'phro ba'i tshul gyis mngon du gyur pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)006:336: da lta 'ching ba kun ldan gyis sems can rnams
NK050(wi)006:337: la sangs rgyas kyi snying po yod ces sgrub bo
NK050(wi)006:338: // de'i phyir rang bzhin gnas rigs 'dus ma byas
NK050(wi)006:339: dang sangs rgyas dang sems can de bzhin nyid du
NK050(wi)006:340: dbyer med par grub pa'i phyir te 'khor 'das mnyam
NK050(wi)006:342: rkang pa gsum pa gnyis kyi don /
NK050(wi)006:343: nam zhig na ye shes chos sku mngon du gyur
NK050(wi)006:344: pa'i gang zag yod na rdo la gser dang til
NK050(wi)006:345: la snum bzhin du dang po nas sangs rgyas rung
NK050(wi)006:346: gi rigs yod par nges te /
NK050(wi)006:347: dri ma spang rung dang yon tan 'bras med kyi
NK050(wi)006:348: chos sku kun la khyad med du yod pa'i phyir
NK050(wi)006:349: lus can kun rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi snying po
NK050(wi)006:350: can du grub po zhes so //
NK050(wi)006:351: rigs pa 'dis chos dbyings 'dus ma byas pa'i rgyu
NK050(wi)006:352: rigs de dri ma sbyangs nas 'tshang rgya ba la
NK050(wi)006:353: mi bslu zhing chud mi za ba'i rgyu 'bras su
NK050(wi)006:354: dpogs pa'o // de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi rnam
NK050(wi)006:355: mkhyen ye shes 'dus ma byas dang mthar thug theg
NK050(wi)006:356: pa gcig tu grub ste lam dang grub mtha' du
NK050(wi)006:357: ma yod kyang mthar thug sems kyi gnas lugs 'di
NK050(wi)006:358: kho na rtogs pa yin la /
NK050(wi)006:359: de la du ma med pas gcig pa nyid de
NK050(wi)006:360: chu bo du ma rgya mtsho dang ro gcig tu
NK050(wi)006:362: rgyas 'gyur ram yang dag blang pa'i rigs zhes pa
NK050(wi)006:363: sems can gyi rgyud na thogs ma med pa nas
NK050(wi)006:364: sems byung gi dge ba sogs sa bon yod pa
NK050(wi)006:365: 'phral byung gi dge ba thos sogs kyi gsos btab
NK050(wi)006:366: ste rus pa brtas pa 'dus byas te rgyu rkyen
NK050(wi)006:367: bzhin no // kha cig rgyas 'gyur gyi rigs kyang
NK050(wi)006:368: gzhir gnas yod de ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje
NK050(wi)006:369: gsum la sku gsum 'byung rung du gsungs pa'i phyir
NK050(wi)006:370: bzhin no // zer / 'dir de'i rigs de bzhin thob pa dang /
NK050(wi)006:371: zhes dri bcas kyi rigs de rang gi ngo bo'i
NK050(wi)006:372: ldog pa nas 'gyur ba med pa bzla ba'i ngo
NK050(wi)006:373: bo ltar yin yang dri mas dag pa'i rim pas
NK050(wi)006:374: gsal snang je cher 'phel zhing gnas yongs su gyur
NK050(wi)006:375: te bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes 'dus ma
NK050(wi)006:377: de yang tshes zla dang nya zla bzhin rnam pa'i ldog pa gzhan gyi ngos nas 'jog dgos so //
NK050(wi)006:379: sems can ye shes spel ba'i phyir //
NK050(wi)006:380: thabs ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan //
NK050(wi)006:381: zhes lam gyi thabs la brten nas gzhi'i ye shes rim gyis 'phel bar gsungs pa ltar ro //
NK050(wi)006:382: des na chos dbyings rang bzhin 'dus ma byas pa'i
NK050(wi)006:383: rigs la rgyu dang 'bras bu chos sku zhes brjod
NK050(wi)006:384: kyang btags pa yin gyi skyed byed dang skyed 'bras
NK050(wi)006:385: dngos ma yin te 'dus byas su 'gyur ba'i phyir
NK050(wi)006:386: / chos nyid la dmigs na yon tan skye ba'i cha nas bzhag ste dmigs rkyen bzhin no //
NK050(wi)006:388: dag rgyu gsum ni rkyen no //
NK050(wi)006:389: zhes khams ni zag med kyi chos kun 'byung ba'i
NK050(wi)006:390: sa bon yin pas dkon mchog gsum gyi rgyu yin
NK050(wi)006:391: te de dri mas dag pa las dkon mchog gsum
NK050(wi)006:392: 'byung ba'i phyir / 'od gsal ba'i khams de lam
NK050(wi)006:393: du byas nas sgom pa bral rgyu dang 'bras bu
NK050(wi)006:394: chos sku'i yon tan rnams nyi ma sprin dang bral
NK050(wi)006:396: khams de nyid dag pa gnyis ldan gyi ngo bo
NK050(wi)006:397: yongs su rtogs pa'i byang chub dang yon tan phrin
NK050(wi)006:398: las gsum ni sems can la 'bras bu'i chos skyed
NK050(wi)006:400: rgyu sa bon med na rkyen 'jug pa don med pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)006:401: sa bon med pa'i gzhir chu lud 'dzoms pa bzhin no //
NK050(wi)006:402: de'i phyir sems can gyi khams la yongs su dag
NK050(wi)006:403: par bya ba'i yon tan dang ldan na de yongs
NK050(wi)006:404: su sbyongs pa'i las byed pa 'thad pa yin no
NK050(wi)006:405: // de la dgongs nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa
NK050(wi)006:406: bcu po rnams su sa le sbram gyi yongs su
NK050(wi)006:408: ma dag pa'i nor bu bee d+aur+ya sbyong ba'i dper mdzad nas gsungs so //
NK050(wi)006:409: gzhan du na gser gyi khams med pa'i rdo phal ba sbyong ba ltar don med de /
NK050(wi)006:411: khams yod na ni las byas pas //
NK050(wi)006:412: sa le sbram ni mthong bar 'gyur //
NK050(wi)006:413: khams med na ni las byas pas //
NK050(wi)006:414: nyon mongs ngal ba tsam du zad //
NK050(wi)006:416: de ltar na bden gnyis zung 'jug chen po spros
NK050(wi)006:417: pa kun dang bral ba so sor rang rig gi
NK050(wi)006:418: spyod yul rnam grangs ma yin pa'i stong pa nyid
NK050(wi)006:419: de sangs rgyas kyi rigs mtshan nyid pa yin pa
NK050(wi)006:420: theg chen gyi mdo rgyud dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa
NK050(wi)006:421: las gsungs shing / pad+ma rtse mo las /
NK050(wi)006:422: dri med dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni //
NK050(wi)006:423: sku gsum ye shes gzhi dang bcas //
NK050(wi)006:424: gang tshe dag pa de nyid du //
NK050(wi)006:425: rang gsal mngon du 'char ba dang //
NK050(wi)006:427: grub thob rnams kyi dgongs don yang dag pa ste /
NK050(wi)006:429: bder gshegs sems las sangs rgyas 'byung //
NK050(wi)006:430: rang sems de la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK050(wi)006:431: nyon mongs nang na ye shes kyang //
NK050(wi)006:432: de bzhin dri ma med par gnas //
NK050(wi)006:435: sems nyid gcig pu kun gyis sa bon te //
NK050(wi)006:436: gang las srid dang mya ngan 'das 'phro ba //
NK050(wi)006:437: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad rab ster ba'i //
NK050(wi)006:438: yid bzhin nor 'dra'i sems la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK050(wi)006:440: de la khams kyi ngo bo mi stong pa'i bden
NK050(wi)006:441: dngos su 'dod na ni rtag lta yin pas nyes
NK050(wi)006:442: te / mdo las dngos po 'du shes can la thar ba med ces dang /
NK050(wi)006:444: gang la stong pa nyid rung ba //
NK050(wi)006:445: de la thams cad rung bar 'gyur //
NK050(wi)006:446: gang la stong nyid mi rung ba //
NK050(wi)006:447: de la thams cad mi rung 'gyur //
NK050(wi)006:449: rang gi ngo bo mi stong na don gzhan gyis stong pas stong go mi chod de /
NK050(wi)006:450: ngo bo bden par zhen pa glo bur gyis dri
NK050(wi)006:451: ma yin pa'i phyir de ma spangs na glo bur
NK050(wi)006:452: gyis stong zhes pa tshig tsam du zad do //
NK050(wi)006:453: khams kyi ngo bo la dpyad na /
NK050(wi)006:454: gzhan las shes min zhi ba dang //
NK050(wi)006:455: spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
NK050(wi)006:456: rnam rtog med don tha dad med //
NK050(wi)006:457: de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do //
NK050(wi)006:458: zhes rtsa shes las bshad pa ltar ro //
NK050(wi)006:459: 'o na dpal phreng gi mdo las /
NK050(wi)006:460: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni
NK050(wi)006:461: skye ba'am rga ba'am 'chi 'pho ba ma lags so
NK050(wi)006:462: // de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa ste /
NK050(wi)006:463: rtag pa brtan pa g.yung drung ngo zhes gsungs so zhe na /
NK050(wi)006:464: khams kyi ngo bo mtha' gcig tu bden dngos rtag pa bzung ba dang mi 'dra ste /
NK050(wi)006:466: bdag gis snying po bstan pa de mu stegs pas bdag bstan pa dang mi 'dra zhes gsungs pas /
NK050(wi)006:467: mu stegs pas bdag ni rtag mi rtag gi zlas phyes pa'i rtag dngos rang mtshan pa yin la /
NK050(wi)006:468: 'di ni rtag mi rtag gi mtha' dang bral ba
NK050(wi)006:469: rtag pa dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste
NK050(wi)006:470: phyin ci ma log pa'i mtshan nyid de theg chen
NK050(wi)006:471: gyi bden pa sgro 'dogs so gnyis dang bral bar
NK050(wi)006:473: yang khams kyi ngo bo dpyad mtha' stong pa'i med
NK050(wi)006:474: kyang tsam dang myang 'das de ltar du 'dod pa
NK050(wi)006:475: ni chad ltar yin par gsungs te /
NK050(wi)006:477: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni
NK050(wi)006:478: gang gi tshe btsal kyang ci yang mi rnyed pa
NK050(wi)006:479: ste / ci yang med pa zhes bya ba ni /
NK050(wi)006:480: gcer bu pa rnams la yang yod mod kyi /
NK050(wi)006:481: tha ba ni de lta bu ma yin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)006:482: de lta bu'i stong pa nyid ni blos bcos nas bzhag pa tsam mo //
NK050(wi)006:483: 'o na stong pa nyid la snying po gsungs pa ji ltar zhe na /
NK050(wi)006:484: snying po'i ngo bo rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid bstan pa yin gyi /
NK050(wi)006:485: ri bo gi rwa ltar cang med ma yin te /
NK050(wi)006:486: gzugs stong pa'o zhes pas gzugs kyi rang bzhin stong
NK050(wi)006:487: pa nyid bstan pa las gzugs snang yang med ces
NK050(wi)006:489: de bzhin du sems kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid
NK050(wi)006:490: bstan gyi ye shes med ces ma bkag pa'i phyir
NK050(wi)006:491: te / bden dngos med par bkag kyang med bzhin snang ba'i tha snyad 'gog pa mi srid de /
NK050(wi)006:492: don dam par ma grub par bstan pas snying po'i
NK050(wi)006:493: yon tan gtan med du 'dod na chos thams cad
NK050(wi)006:495: don dam par gang yang ma grub pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)006:497: stong pa nyid ni ston pa'i mdo /
NK050(wi)006:498: rgyal bas ji snyed gsungs pa ste //
NK050(wi)006:499: de dag kun gyis nyon mongs ldog /
NK050(wi)006:500: khams de nyams par byed ma yin //
NK050(wi)006:502: gal te snying po'i don de med pa kho na
NK050(wi)006:503: yin na med mtha' ma khegs pa'i phyir yod pa'i
NK050(wi)006:504: rnam bzhag thams cad chad do //
NK050(wi)006:505: des na dbyings nges don yod na ye shes nges don kyang yod dgos pa rigs pas grub ste /
NK050(wi)006:506: mdo sngags kyis brjod bya mthar thug dbyings dang ye shes gnyis yin cing /
NK050(wi)006:507: rnam shes la mi rton ye shes la rton pa dang /
NK050(wi)006:508: sangs rgyas nyid kyi snying po yang bden stong gi ye shes yin te /
NK050(wi)006:509: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
NK050(wi)006:511: chos kyi dbyings de ye shes nges don gyi yul
NK050(wi)006:512: yin te don dam par dpyad na don dam bden
NK050(wi)006:513: pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul las kyang 'das par
NK050(wi)006:514: bshad kyang tha snyad du rtogs byar yod pa ltar
NK050(wi)006:515: / ye shes kyang de bzhin du 'dod dgos kyi
NK050(wi)006:516: gzhan du na rtogs byed med par 'gyur ba'i phyir
NK050(wi)006:517: / ro // gnyis pa gzhan lugs mi 'thad par bshad pa ni /
NK050(wi)006:519: 'dir sems can rnams la sems zhum pa la sogs
NK050(wi)006:520: pa'i nyes pa lnga spong ba'i phyir snying po yod
NK050(wi)006:521: ces bstan pas yon tan gyis mi stong par bshad
NK050(wi)006:522: pa sogs drang don yin pas sgra ji bzhin du
NK050(wi)006:524: 'gos lo sogs rjes 'brang bcas na re /
NK050(wi)006:525: rdzogs sangs sku ni 'phro zhes dang /
NK050(wi)006:526: sangs rgyas ye shes sems can tshogs zhugs zhes sangs
NK050(wi)006:527: rgyas kyi ye shes dngos yin la sems can gyis
NK050(wi)006:529: de bzhin nyid dbyer med dang /
NK050(wi)006:530: rang bzhin dri med ces pa sangs rgyas dang sems
NK050(wi)006:531: can gnyis ka la khyab pas gnyis ka yin la
NK050(wi)006:533: sangs rgyas rigs la de 'bras nyer btags ces pa sems can gyis snying po dngos dang /
NK050(wi)006:534: sangs rgyas btags pa yin no zhes gsungs /
NK050(wi)006:535: 'gos lo chen po'i gsungs de dgongs pa can du
NK050(wi)006:536: snang yang rjes su sgra ji bzhin smra ba de
NK050(wi)006:537: la bshad pa / don bden stong la dgongs pas
NK050(wi)006:538: yon tan yod pa khas mi len na mtshungs chos
NK050(wi)006:539: can gyi dpe dgu po yang nang na sgrib bya
NK050(wi)006:540: med pas sgrib byed pad+ma stong pa la sogs pa
NK050(wi)006:541: kho na las snying po dang ldan pa nyid du
NK050(wi)006:543: 'dir snying po bstan pa ni nges pa'i don la
NK050(wi)006:544: 'jug pa'i dgos dbang gis drang por dgongs pa ste
NK050(wi)006:545: don dngos la dgongs pa'i drang don ces bya ste
NK050(wi)006:548: lag bzang gis ni zhus pa las //
NK050(wi)006:549: dman mos sems can don gyi phyir //
NK050(wi)006:550: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs //
NK050(wi)006:551: zhes sems bskyed kyi phan yon bstan nas theg pa
NK050(wi)006:552: chen po la kha drangs ba ltar 'khor lo gsum
NK050(wi)006:553: gyi ched du bya ba'i gdul bya rnams rim gyis
NK050(wi)006:554: gong mar drangs dgos te 'khor lo gsum pa'i gong
NK050(wi)006:555: na drangs byar med pa'i phyir ro //
NK050(wi)006:556: sangs rgyas 'byung rung gi rgyu zag med kyi chos
NK050(wi)006:557: dang ldan pa'i rigs mtshan nyid pa med par sa
NK050(wi)006:558: rdo sogs la'ang khyab pas bden stong tsam la drangs
NK050(wi)006:559: pas sems can la dga' ba'i khyad par ci zhig
NK050(wi)006:560: thob ste lag stong bcings pas byis pa brid pa
NK050(wi)006:561: bzhin no // de ltar na sems zhum pa 'os te rgyu med pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)006:562: sems can la brnyas pas nyes pa ci 'byung sa rdo sogs la brnyas pa bzhin no //
NK050(wi)006:563: sems can gyi rang bzhin bden stong la rigs su byas pas sangs rgyas rung ngo snyam na /
NK050(wi)006:565: sangs rgya rung ba yin te /
NK050(wi)006:566: bden med yin pa'i phyir zhes 'god na /
NK050(wi)006:567: sa rdo sogs la'ang rtags te 'jug pas ma nges pa'i gtan tshigs des sgrub mi nus so //
NK050(wi)006:568: sa rdo sogs la sems med la sems can la
NK050(wi)006:569: sems yod pas snying po bden stong la dmigs shing
NK050(wi)006:570: lam rkyen tshogs gnyis kyis zin na 'bras bu'i yon
NK050(wi)006:571: tan rnams bzod 'byung rung ngo zhe na /
NK050(wi)006:572: zin byed lam rkyen de sangs rgyas pa las zin
NK050(wi)006:573: bya'i rigs ni mi yin te bden stong la 'gyur
NK050(wi)006:575: rkyen tshogs na 'bras bu 'byung rung gi rgyu de
NK050(wi)006:576: sa bon grung po ltar nus pa dang ldan pa
NK050(wi)006:577: zhig dgos kyi / nus med stong rkyang tsam la
NK050(wi)006:578: rkyen gyis ci yang skyed mi nus te nam mkha'
NK050(wi)006:579: zhig dgos kyi / bzhin no // sems sems byung
NK050(wi)006:580: ni ye shes su mi 'dod la de dag spang
NK050(wi)006:581: byar byas nas de dag gi rang bzhin stong pa
NK050(wi)006:582: 'dus ma byas la ye shes skye ba mi srid
NK050(wi)006:583: zhig dgos kyi / bzhin no // do // dri ma med par grags pa'i mdo las /
NK050(wi)006:585: dgon dung gi phyogs su ut+pa la sogs dri mchog
NK050(wi)006:586: rnams mi skyed pa bzhin 'dus ma byas thog pa'i
NK050(wi)006:587: sems can la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mi skye
NK050(wi)006:588: ba dang / nam mkha' la sa bon skye ba
NK050(wi)006:589: mi srid pa'i dpe bstan nas gsungs pa ltar ro
NK050(wi)006:590: ba dang / // des na sems kyis snang tsam la dmigs bcas bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /
NK050(wi)006:591: ye shes kyi rang bzhin med pa la dmigs med
NK050(wi)006:592: ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa de thugs la 'thad
NK050(wi)006:593: na / dmigs med la dmigs pa'i ye shes de
NK050(wi)006:594: sems can rang la lhan skyes su yod pa zhig
NK050(wi)006:595: byung ba ma yin par sngar med gsar skye 'dod
NK050(wi)006:596: na / na / rnam shes sngar med gsar skyes yang yod par 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)006:597: sangs rgyas dngos kyi ye shes sems can la 'phro
NK050(wi)006:598: ba de dri bcas kyi rigs su 'dod pa mi
NK050(wi)006:599: 'thad de / 'dir sems can gyi khams dri bcas
NK050(wi)006:600: 'chad pa'i skabs yin la dri ma med pa sangs
NK050(wi)006:601: rgyas kyi ye shes ma yin no //
NK050(wi)006:602: gal te yin na dri ma dgu po yang sangs
NK050(wi)006:603: rgyas kyi ye shes sgrib byed du bzhed rigs so
NK050(wi)006:605: de bzhin shes bya thams cad la //
NK050(wi)006:606: rgyal ba'i ye shes cig char snang //
NK050(wi)006:609: mkhyen pa'i skad cig gcig la ni //
NK050(wi)006:610: shes bya'i dkyil 'khor kun khyab can //
NK050(wi)006:612: sa rdo sogs dngos po dman pa thams cad la'ang
NK050(wi)006:613: bder gshegs snying po'i khyab pa'i phyir brnyas sogs byas
NK050(wi)006:615: de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yul shes bya
NK050(wi)006:616: thams cad la khyab cing de la rigs su mi
NK050(wi)006:617: 'jog cing shes bya thams cad sangs rgya ba'i rgyu
NK050(wi)006:620: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sems can la khyab cing
NK050(wi)006:621: de bzhin du phrin las 'jug pa'i phyir don yod
NK050(wi)006:622: do zhe na / 'o na phrin las kyang sems
NK050(wi)006:623: can gyi rigs su 'gyur te rgyal ba'i phrin las
NK050(wi)006:624: kyi 'jug pa rgyun mi chad pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)006:625: de bas na de dngos po gzhan la khyad pa'i
NK050(wi)006:626: ye shes chos sku de ka bum sogs kyi rigs
NK050(wi)006:627: su mi 'jog pa bzhin du sems can gyi khams
NK050(wi)006:628: mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang de'i rigs mtshan nyid pa
NK050(wi)006:629: yin pa mi 'thad par shes par bya'o //
NK050(wi)006:630: 'dir sems can la rang bzhin du gnas pa'i rigs sam rgyu bshad pa yin la /
NK050(wi)006:631: 'gro ba'i khams sna tshogs mkhyen nas de dang mthun
NK050(wi)006:632: pa'i phrin las 'jug pa ni sems can rang la
NK050(wi)006:633: lhan skyes su yod pa'i rigs mngon du 'gyur ba'i
NK050(wi)006:634: rkyen yin gyi rgyu ma yin no //
NK050(wi)006:635: gzhan yang mdo sde rgyan las /
NK050(wi)006:636: gang phyir sems can mir gyur pa //
NK050(wi)006:637: tshad med skad cig re re la //
NK050(wi)006:638: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob de'i phyir //
NK050(wi)006:639: zhum pa dang du blang mi bya //
NK050(wi)006:642: srin bu pad ma yan chad chos la brtson pa'i
NK050(wi)006:643: stobs bskyed na sangs rgyas thob par gsungs pa dang
NK050(wi)006:644: / ma 'ongs par 'tshar mi rgya ba'i sems can gcig kyang mi srid pas /
NK050(wi)006:645: de dag gi sgo nas sems zhum pa la sogs
NK050(wi)006:646: pa'i nyes pa spong zhing spro ba skyed par byas
NK050(wi)006:647: na / 'di ltar bu thun mong ma yin pa'i dpe du mas snying po sgrub cig dgos te /
NK050(wi)006:648: de yang drang don yin par 'dod pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)006:649: gal te sems can thams cad nges par 'tshang rgya
NK050(wi)006:650: rung bar bshad pas nyes pa de dag mi spang
NK050(wi)006:651: na / da lta snying po dri ma dang bcas pa 'tshang rgya bar ni mi 'dod la /
NK050(wi)006:652: dri ma sbyangs nas gzod 'tshang rgya bar bshad pas
NK050(wi)006:653: kyang nyes pa de dag mi spong zhing las sgrub
NK050(wi)006:654: pa la spro ba mi bskyed par mtshungs par 'gyur
NK050(wi)006:655: ro // rnam bzhag 'di dag rang rgyud kyi ye
NK050(wi)006:656: shes ma rtogs pas rdzogs sangs sku ni 'phro phyir
NK050(wi)006:657: zhes pa'i rtags la the tshom zos nas 'di ltar
NK050(wi)006:659: 'di 'dra rten la rab gnas byed tshe ye shes
NK050(wi)006:660: phab pa lta bu 'gro ba'i khams su 'jog pa
NK050(wi)006:661: bas kyang 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis sems can la
NK050(wi)006:662: spro ba skyed cing brnyas sogs spangs nas gus pa
NK050(wi)006:666: gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
NK050(wi)006:667: ras dang tshon la sogs pa yi //
NK050(wi)006:668: gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa la //
NK050(wi)006:669: byin rlabs ye shes dbab byas nas //
NK050(wi)006:670: lha yin zer nas mchod sogs te //
NK050(wi)006:671: bcos ma la sogs de lta na //
NK050(wi)006:672: phung sogs ye nas sangs rgyas la //
NK050(wi)006:673: ci yi phyir na mchod mi byed //
NK050(wi)006:674: ces gsungs pa'i phyir me'i tsha ba ltar sems can
NK050(wi)006:675: rang gi gnas lugs gzhan la rag ma las pa'i
NK050(wi)006:676: rang bzhin te / rtsa shes las /
NK050(wi)006:677: rang bzhin dag ni bcos min dang //
NK050(wi)006:678: gzhan la ltos pa yod ma yin //
NK050(wi)006:680: sngags su sems can sangs rgyas bsgrub pa'i rgyu yang
NK050(wi)006:681: bder gshegs snying po 'di kho na yin zhing gzhung
NK050(wi)006:682: 'di'i snying po bstan pa dang dgongs pa gcig go
NK050(wi)006:686: rgyud ni rgyun chags la brjod de //
NK050(wi)006:688: mya ngan 'das pa rgyud phyi ma //
NK050(wi)006:689: zhes gsungs pa ltar sems can gyi khams dri bcas
NK050(wi)006:690: kyi ye shes nyid ye nas rgyun chags su gnas
NK050(wi)006:693: 'bras bu byang chub sogs gzhan rnams mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyud de bla ma'am phyi ma'o //
NK050(wi)006:694: gzhung 'di mdo dgongs 'grel gzhan dang mi 'dra bas
NK050(wi)006:695: 'dir rgyud lung 'dren pa la skabs su babs pa'i
NK050(wi)006:696: skyon med do // gsum pa rang lugs 'thad pa la rtsod spong ni /
NK050(wi)006:698: sangs rgyas kyi rigs la 'bras btags nas sangs rgyas
NK050(wi)006:699: kyi snying po yod par ma smras sam zhe na
NK050(wi)006:700: / yin mod kyang sems can la da lta nas
NK050(wi)006:701: sku dang ye shes dngos su yod na sangs rgyas
NK050(wi)006:702: yin gyi sems can ma yin la /
NK050(wi)006:703: rgyu la 'bras bu'i ming gis btags nas sangs rgyas
NK050(wi)006:704: zhes 'dod na sems la ye shes zhes btags nas
NK050(wi)006:705: khas blangs kyang mchog pa ci yod de /
NK050(wi)006:706: gzhan rgyud kyi ye shes gzhan rgyud du 'jog pa dang mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
NK050(wi)006:707: tshur mthong gi snang ngor sku dang ye shes btags
NK050(wi)006:708: par song yang don gyi gnas tshul la gdags gzhi
NK050(wi)006:709: yon tan yod pas yin gyi /
NK050(wi)006:710: gzhi med la btags pa ma yin te /
NK050(wi)006:711: dper na khams yod pa'i rdo ba la sa le
NK050(wi)006:712: sbram du btags kyang rdo dngos gser ma yin yang
NK050(wi)006:713: gser las gzhan na gser med de bzhus na gser
NK050(wi)006:716: khyod kyi rang bzhin gnas rigs de sems can kho
NK050(wi)006:717: na las yul gzhan la ma khyab pas chos kyi
NK050(wi)006:718: dbyings ris su chad par thal lo zhe na /
NK050(wi)006:720: nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa las /
NK050(wi)006:721: sna tshogs mdzes dga' me tog kha phye zhing //
NK050(wi)006:722: gser gyi khang bzang 'bar ba yin 'ong ba //
NK050(wi)006:723: 'di na de dag byed po 'ga' yang med //
NK050(wi)006:724: de dag rtog pa'i dbang gis bzhag pa ste //
NK050(wi)006:725: rtog pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten nye bar brtags //
NK050(wi)006:728: nor bu rin chen rar bzhin yongs dag pa //
NK050(wi)006:729: gos kyi drung bzhag sna tshogs tshon du 'gyur //
NK050(wi)006:730: de bzhin rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang //
NK050(wi)006:731: log pa'i rnam par rtogs pas de ltar 'gyur //
NK050(wi)006:733: sems kyi dbang gis yul byung ba las yul gyi dbang gis sems byung ba ma yin zhing /
NK050(wi)006:734: glo bur ba'i yul snang rnams sems kyi yul zhes
NK050(wi)006:735: tha dad par tha snyad btags kyang don du sems
NK050(wi)006:736: las gzhan du grub pa med pa theg chen kun
NK050(wi)006:737: gyis bzhed de / 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis /
NK050(wi)006:738: 'byung ba che la sogs bshad pa //
NK050(wi)006:739: rnam par shes su yang dag 'du //
NK050(wi)006:742: lcags bsregs sa gzhi su yis byas //
NK050(wi)006:743: me tshogs de dag ci las byung //
NK050(wi)006:744: de 'dra de dag thams cad kun //
NK050(wi)006:745: sdig sems yin par thub pas gsung //
NK050(wi)006:748: ut+pala la rtsa tha ma las /
NK050(wi)006:749: lo ma la sogs rgyun 'byung ltar //
NK050(wi)006:750: de bzhin sems rdzas med pa yang //
NK050(wi)006:751: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba'o //
NK050(wi)006:752: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dbyings kyi gnas rigs de nyid rgya chad phyogs lhung dang bral ba yin no //
NK050(wi)006:753: gzhan yang sems can la ye shes med na lus
NK050(wi)006:754: can la yod zag pa med pa'i shes pa sbrang
NK050(wi)006:757: de ni zag pa med pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes so zer na /
NK050(wi)006:758: ma yin te zag med ces pa glo bur gyi
NK050(wi)006:759: dri ma gshis la ma zhugs pa'i rang bzhin rnam
NK050(wi)006:760: dag ste dri bcas bden stong gi shes pa bstan
NK050(wi)006:761: te / bdag 'dzin gnyis po glo bur gyi dri
NK050(wi)006:762: ma dang bdag med gnyis gnas lugs snying por 'dod
NK050(wi)006:763: na de rtogs byed kyi ye shes kyang dbyings dang
NK050(wi)006:764: ro gcig tu yod par 'dod rigs so //
NK050(wi)006:765: de ni dper na sbrang rtsi mngar ba ro gcig
NK050(wi)006:766: pa ltar nam zhig dri ma dag pa'i stong pa
NK050(wi)006:767: nyid dang ro gcig pa'i shes rig zab mo nyams
NK050(wi)006:768: su myong byar yod pa yin gyi /
NK050(wi)006:769: de las gzhan du na sems can sangs rgyas tshe
NK050(wi)006:770: sangs rgyas gzhan gyi ye shes nyams su myong bar
NK050(wi)006:771: thal ba'i smra ba de 'dra ya mtshan pa'i gnas
NK050(wi)006:772: so // sems can gyi khams med dgag rang gi
NK050(wi)006:773: ngo bo la mkhyen pa'i cha tsam yang med par
NK050(wi)006:774: 'dod na phyis su sangs rgyas pa'i dus su yang
NK050(wi)006:775: ci yang mi mkhyen par 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)006:776: sangs rgyas dus rnam mkhyen 'dod na sngar mkhyen cha
NK050(wi)006:777: med par ma grub ste dri bcas kyi shes pa
NK050(wi)006:778: gnas gyur te rnam mkhyen du song bar gsal lo
NK050(wi)006:779: // shes na mi shes 'jig par thal //
NK050(wi)006:780: zhes pa dang tshul mtshungs so //
NK050(wi)006:782: sems can rnams da lta nas sangs rgyas pa'i rang
NK050(wi)006:783: bzhin du yod na sgrib pa bsal nas shes bya
NK050(wi)006:784: thams cad ci'i phyir mi mkhyen zhe na /
NK050(wi)006:785: khyod ni gnas tshul sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin yang
NK050(wi)006:786: khas blangs snang tshul sgrib pa bsal rgyud yang khas
NK050(wi)006:787: blangs nas smra ba la lan mang du yod kyang
NK050(wi)006:788: de ltar yin du chug mod /
NK050(wi)006:789: 'o na sems can thams cad bdag med gnyis kyi
NK050(wi)006:790: rang bzhin du yod na bdag 'dzin bsal nas bdag
NK050(wi)006:791: med kyi gnas lugs ci'i phyir mi mkhyen te mtshungs
NK050(wi)006:792: pa'i phyir / 'di ni bum nang gi mar me
NK050(wi)006:793: la'ang 'od yod pas mun pa bsal nas snang ba
NK050(wi)006:794: ci'i phyir mi ston zer ba bzhin no //
NK050(wi)006:795: yang sems can rgyu dang sangs rgyas 'bras bu yin
NK050(wi)006:796: na rgyu la 'bras gnas dgag byed zan za mi
NK050(wi)006:797: gtsang za'i rigs pas gnod do zhe na /
NK050(wi)006:799: grangs can pas bskyed bya skyed byed kyi rgyu 'bras
NK050(wi)006:800: gnyis lhan cig tu yod par 'dod pa la snang
NK050(wi)006:801: rung mi dmigs pas khegs pa dang zan dang mi
NK050(wi)006:802: gtsang gnyis rang bzhin gcig tu song ba'i skyon de
NK050(wi)006:803: yod la / 'di la de 'dra'i gnod pa mi srid de /
NK050(wi)006:804: rnam shes dang ye shes chos can dang chos nyid
NK050(wi)006:805: kyi khyad par dang gnas tshul sangs rgyas kyang snang
NK050(wi)006:806: tshul la 'khrul ba'i sems can srid pa'i dbang du
NK050(wi)006:808: rgyu 'bras su bstan pa yang sa myug ltar min pa gong du bstan zin to //
NK050(wi)006:809: khyod ltar na yang chos can ka bum sogs la chos nyid bden stong gnas pa dang /
NK050(wi)006:810: chos dang gang zag gi bdag 'dzin gyi blo gnyis
NK050(wi)006:811: thabs sam rgyu dang bdag med rtogs pa'i rig pa
NK050(wi)006:812: gnyis thabs byung ngam 'bras bu zhes 'dod dgos te
NK050(wi)006:814: tha snyad bden pa thabs su 'gyur ba dang //
NK050(wi)006:815: don dam bden pa thabs byung gyur pa ste //
NK050(wi)006:816: zhes thabs las thabs byung sogs rgyu 'bras kyi tha
NK050(wi)006:817: snyad de 'dra mang du yod pa'i phyir de la'ang
NK050(wi)006:818: rgyu la 'bras gnas kyi rigs pas gnod pa ston
NK050(wi)006:819: dgos so // 'dir sems can gyi khams bder gshegs
NK050(wi)006:820: snying po chos dbyings stong pa'i snying po can du
NK050(wi)006:821: theg chen mdo sngags kun gyi zab gnad mthar thug
NK050(wi)006:822: tu dgongs 'grel mkhan po tshad thub rnams kyis zhal
NK050(wi)006:823: gyi bzhes pa la shes rab 'chal ba'i rtog ge'i
NK050(wi)006:824: rig log ston pa'i gnas shig rnyed na /
NK050(wi)006:825: de la ston pa dang bstan pa tshad mas grub pa mi srid par 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)006:827: sems can gyi gzhi na ma 'khrul pa'i ye shes
NK050(wi)006:828: yod na rnam shes ma rig pa 'khrul ba'ang yod
NK050(wi)006:829: pas spang gnyen gnyis snang mun yun ring 'grogs pa
NK050(wi)006:830: lta bu'i skyon do zhe na /
NK050(wi)006:831: spyir ye shes yin na spang bya'i dngos gnyen gyi ye shes yin mi dgos te /
NK050(wi)006:832: 'dir gter la sogs pa dpe dgus bstan pa ltar
NK050(wi)006:833: dri mas bsgribs pa'i sbubs na dngos su mi mngon
NK050(wi)006:834: pa'i ye shes la snying po rjod kyi dri mas
NK050(wi)006:835: dag pa'i ye shes bshad pa ma yin pa'i phyir
NK050(wi)006:836: / gzhung du glo bur gyi dri ma ma dag pa sems can dang /
NK050(wi)006:837: dag ma dag gnyis dang ldan pa lam zhugs byang sems dang /
NK050(wi)006:838: shin tu dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes gsungs pa ma mthong bar zad do //
NK050(wi)006:839: khyed rang lugs la nyan rang dgra bcom rnams la
NK050(wi)006:840: bdag med gnyis rtogs kyi ye shes yod pa shes
NK050(wi)006:841: sgrib ma rigs pa dang bskal pa du mar 'grogs
NK050(wi)006:842: par 'dod par 'dod pa la la snang mun 'grogs
NK050(wi)006:843: pa'i skyon de med na 'di la de bas kyang
NK050(wi)006:846: khyod kyi lugs 'dir sangs dang sems can la gzhi
NK050(wi)006:847: mthun gyi sems yod par thal ba bzlog tu med
NK050(wi)006:848: do zhe na / te bor bzlog tu yod do //
NK050(wi)006:849: sems kyi chos nyid snying po dang chos can rnam
NK050(wi)006:850: shes gnyis gcig tha dad gang du'ang khas len med
NK050(wi)006:852: 'du byed khams dang don dam mtshan nyid ni //
NK050(wi)006:853: gcig dang tha dad bral ba'i mtshan nyid de //
NK050(wi)006:854: gcig dang tha dad nyid du gang rtogs pa //
NK050(wi)006:855: de dag tshul min ltar la zhugs pa yin //
NK050(wi)006:857: khyod rang gis rnam mkhyen ye shes 'dus byas su
NK050(wi)006:858: 'dod pa de ngo bo chos nyid dang tha dad
NK050(wi)006:859: du 'dod na so sor rtag chad du 'gyur la
NK050(wi)006:860: / gcig tu 'dod na chos nyid 'dus byas su
NK050(wi)006:861: 'gyur ba'am yang na ye shes 'dus ma byas su
NK050(wi)006:862: / 'gyur ro // de bzhin du 'dir yang sems
NK050(wi)006:863: dang sems nyid gcig tu 'dod na su yang thar
NK050(wi)006:865: spangs nas ma 'khrul ba'i snying po sems nyid rtogs
NK050(wi)006:866: bya tha dad med pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)006:867: yang na su yang 'khrul mi srid de 'khrul sems
NK050(wi)006:868: mthong ba de ma 'khrul pa'i sems nyid mthong ba
NK050(wi)006:870: tha dad du 'dod na chos can la brten nas chos nyid rtogs pa med la /
NK050(wi)006:871: chos nyid dang bral ba'i chos can yang rang bzhin
NK050(wi)006:872: gyis grub par 'gyur bas nam yang med par mi
NK050(wi)006:874: rang bzhin med pa las ldog na //
NK050(wi)006:875: rang bzhin nyid du rab grub 'gyur //
NK050(wi)006:877: rnam shes yod na ye shes yod de rnam shes ye shes dngos min yang /
NK050(wi)006:878: ye shes nyid rnam shes las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)006:879: kun rdzob dang don dam bzhin no zhes dang sems
NK050(wi)006:880: kyi sa bon las sems 'byung ba bzhin du ye
NK050(wi)006:881: shes kyi sa bon las ye shes 'byung bar 'dod
NK050(wi)006:883: mig la sogs dang yul rnams kyang //
NK050(wi)006:884: ye shes lnga po nyid dag ste //
NK050(wi)006:887: gnas tshul chos nyid las g.yo ba med bzhin snang
NK050(wi)006:888: tshul 'khrul pa'i sdug bsngal mu med pa sems can
NK050(wi)006:890: lam rkyen tshogs bsags kyis glo bur 'khrul pa'i cha
NK050(wi)006:891: zad par spangs nas dag pa gnyis ldan gyi bde
NK050(wi)006:892: ba mu med pa sangs rgyas kyi ldog pa dmigs
NK050(wi)006:893: bzhin du gzhi mthun zhes gang la smra /
NK050(wi)006:894: de'i phyir sems can gyi khams la sangs rgyas kyi
NK050(wi)006:895: yon tan yod na gzhi mthun gyi thal ba so
NK050(wi)006:896: na gnas so zhes gyi nar smra ba dag de
NK050(wi)006:898: khyod kyis yang na de bzhin nyid dbyer med phyir dang /
NK050(wi)006:900: sangs rgyas glo bur gyi dri ma dag pas kyang
NK050(wi)006:901: mya ngan las 'das pa dang sems can rang bzhin
NK050(wi)006:902: gyis mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis bshad pa la
NK050(wi)006:904: dri bcas kyi ye shes dang dri ma med pa'i
NK050(wi)006:905: ye shes ni dag ma dag gi ldog pa'i phye
NK050(wi)006:907: 'di ni thal 'gyur bas sems can rang bzhin gyis
NK050(wi)006:908: mya ngan las 'das par bshad pa'i don ma go
NK050(wi)006:910: gal te sems can mya ngan 'da' //
NK050(wi)006:911: 'khor ba kun rdzob de lta na //
NK050(wi)006:913: byang chub spyod pas ci zhig bya //
NK050(wi)006:915: yang rtog ge 'bar ba dag gis smras pa /
NK050(wi)006:916: rnam mkhyen gyi ye shes 'dus ma byas rtag par
NK050(wi)006:917: 'dod na yul 'dus byas kyi chos rnams skad cig
NK050(wi)006:918: ma'i go rim mkhyen pa mi 'thad de /
NK050(wi)006:919: rtag pa la go rim med pa'i phyir zhe'o //
NK050(wi)006:921: sangs rgyas nyid 'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes kyi
NK050(wi)006:922: sku can rtag pa dam pa'i rang bzhin yin pa
NK050(wi)006:923: sogs myang 'das kyi mdo sogs las mang du gsungs
NK050(wi)006:924: pa rnams yi ge mang ba'i phyir 'dir mi 'dren
NK050(wi)006:925: la / sangs rgyas nyid kyis shes bya mkhyen tshul gyi lung mang yang mdor bsdu na /
NK050(wi)006:926: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las /
NK050(wi)006:927: chos kun mnyam pa nyid mnyam par //
NK050(wi)006:928: rang byung bas ni rjes su rtogs //
NK050(wi)006:929: de phyir yang dag mngon sangs rgyas //
NK050(wi)006:930: de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs pa mnyam //
NK050(wi)006:933: ji ltar snod kyi dbye bas mkha' la dbye ba med de ltar //
NK050(wi)006:934: dngos byas dbye ba 'ga' yang de nyid la med de yi phyir //
NK050(wi)006:935: ro mnyam nyid du yang dag thugs su chud par mdzad gyur na //
NK050(wi)006:936: mkhyen bzang khyod kyis skad cig gis ni shes bya thugs su chud //
NK050(wi)006:938: gzung 'dzin gyi dri ma mtha' dag zad cing gnas
NK050(wi)006:939: yongs su gyur pa'i ye shes shes bya kun dang
NK050(wi)006:940: ro mnyam zhing skye 'gag dang bral ba'i ngang nas
NK050(wi)006:941: gnas lugs bdag med gnyis gzigs pa dang snga phyi
NK050(wi)006:942: med par chos can thams cad kyang ma 'dres yongs
NK050(wi)006:943: rdzogs mkhyen gyi / snga ma la rim can med
NK050(wi)006:944: pas phyi ma'ang cig char du gzigs pa ste snga
NK050(wi)006:946: dper na me long gcig la sna tshogs kyi gzugs
NK050(wi)006:947: brnyan shar ba'i tshul du gzigs pa'i ye shes 'dus
NK050(wi)006:948: byas ma byas sogs spros pa'i mtha' dang bral ba
NK050(wi)006:949: rang byung gi ye shes chen po zhes bya ste
NK050(wi)006:950: / sangs rgyas nyid kyi khyad chos bsam gyis mi
NK050(wi)006:951: khyab pa yin pa'i phyir tshul mthong gi yul shes
NK050(wi)006:952: pa'i shes pa skad cig ma de 'dra sangs rgyas
NK050(wi)006:954: ji ltar sngar bzhin phyis de bzhin //
NK050(wi)006:955: 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid do //
NK050(wi)006:956: zhes gsungs pa ltar gdod ma'i dbyings dang dbyer med pa'i ye shes 'dus ma byas la 'dod do //
NK050(wi)006:957: gzhi na ye nas med pa lam gyis gsar du
NK050(wi)006:958: byas pa'i ye shes yin na 'dus byas las 'os
NK050(wi)006:959: med la / de ltar na rang byung gi ye shes ma yin pa dang /
NK050(wi)006:960: skad cig gi 'jig cing mi brtan pas bslu ba can du 'gyur ba'i phyir /
NK050(wi)006:961: dam pa'i don du mi slu ba'i /
NK050(wi)006:962: skyabs ni sangs rgyas nyag gcig yin //
NK050(wi)006:964: 'dir mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'gog pa yang dag pa dang /
NK050(wi)006:965: don dam pa'i bden pa rnams don gcig pa'i phyir
NK050(wi)006:966: de la dngos po dang dngos po med pa la
NK050(wi)006:967: sogs pa'i 'du shes pa ni spros pa'i 'ching ba
NK050(wi)006:968: ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku mthong ba'i
NK050(wi)006:971: gang dag sangs rgyas spros 'das shing //
NK050(wi)006:972: zad pa med la spros byed pa //
NK050(wi)006:973: spros pas nyams pa de kun gyis //
NK050(wi)006:974: de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngo //
NK050(wi)006:976: gal te mya ngan 'das dngos na //
NK050(wi)006:978: dngos po 'dus byas ma yin la //
NK050(wi)006:979: 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
NK050(wi)006:981: de'i phyir dang po stong pa nyid kyi don de
NK050(wi)006:982: blo dang blos bzhag pa'i bcos ma ma yin pa
NK050(wi)006:983: dang / rang gi ngo bo nyid nas zhi ba
NK050(wi)006:984: chos can thams cad kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma
NK050(wi)006:985: yin par shes pas mya ngan las 'das pa shes
NK050(wi)006:987: gang dag stong nyid mi shes pa //
NK050(wi)006:988: de yis mya ngan 'das mi shes //
NK050(wi)006:989: de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa //
NK050(wi)006:990: 'jig pas stong nyid shes par gyis //
NK050(wi)006:992: 'dus byas dngos po ma yin pa //
NK050(wi)006:993: 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
NK050(wi)006:994: zhes bzlog ste bton na mtshungs par mi 'gyur ram /
NK050(wi)006:995: yang mkhas par grags pa kha cig /
NK050(wi)006:996: kun rdzob skye 'jig byed pas de'i rang bzhin don
NK050(wi)006:997: dam mi 'jig pa ltar ye shes skye 'jig byed
NK050(wi)006:998: pas de'i ngo bo chos dbyings 'dus byas su mi
NK050(wi)006:1000: sangs rgyas kyi gdams gzhi chos dbyings 'ba' zhig tu mi 'thad pa gong du bshad la /
NK050(wi)006:1001: tshur mthong gi snang ngo'i bum pa'i gnas snang gi
NK050(wi)006:1002: dpe de spros pa kun zhi ba gnyis su med
NK050(wi)006:1003: pa'i ye shes mnga' ba la mi 'thad do //
NK050(wi)006:1004: kho bo cag sems kyi skye 'jig gi gnas lugs
NK050(wi)006:1005: 'dus ma byas kyi ye shes mi 'gyur bar 'dod
NK050(wi)006:1006: pas sangs rgyas nyid ye shes 'dus ma byas kyi
NK050(wi)006:1008: yang 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams ni 'dus ma byas
NK050(wi)006:1009: kyis rab tu phye ba'i slad du'o zhes gsungs pa'i
NK050(wi)006:1010: don gang yin / de'i ngo bo bden stong la gsungs so //
NK050(wi)006:1011: bden stong tsam yul kun la khyab pas shes bya
NK050(wi)006:1012: thams cad ni 'dus ma byas kyis phye zhes ci'i
NK050(wi)006:1013: phyir ma gsungs / ma yin te /
NK050(wi)006:1014: 'dus ma byas mngon du rtogs pas so zhe na /
NK050(wi)006:1015: 'o na de rtogs pa'i gnyis med kyi ye shes
NK050(wi)006:1016: rang byung 'dus ma byas pa de 'phags pa'i phye
NK050(wi)006:1018: 'dus ma byas stong rkyang tsam rtogs pas 'phags par 'jog na /
NK050(wi)006:1019: nam mkha' mthong bas kyang 'phags par 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)006:1020: des na so so rang rig pa'i ye shes dbyings
NK050(wi)006:1021: dang ro mnyam pa rtogs pa 'phags pa'i phye chos
NK050(wi)006:1024: mkhyen pa'i skad cig gcig la ni //
NK050(wi)006:1025: zhes sogs gsungs pas ye shes skad cig ma 'dus byas su grub ce na /
NK050(wi)006:1026: de ni gzhan gyi skad cig ma'i yud tsam la mkhyen pa'i don yin no //
NK050(wi)006:1027: gal te min na skad cig dang po la shes
NK050(wi)006:1028: bya thams cad mkhyen nas skad cig phyi ma rnams
NK050(wi)006:1030: skad cig ma'i rgyun gyis mkhyen no snyam na ma yin te /
NK050(wi)006:1031: rtogs zin rtogs pa'i rig pa ste rnam mkhyen tshang min du 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)006:1032: gzhan yang rnam mkhyen 'dus byas mi rtag par 'dod na /
NK050(wi)006:1033: gang mi rtag pa ni sdug bsngal ba'o //
NK050(wi)006:1036: mi gnod de dag pa'i zhing dang sa lam rnams
NK050(wi)006:1037: 'dus byas yin yang sdug bsngal ma yin pa'i phyir
NK050(wi)006:1038: 'dus byas yin na sdug bsngal yin pas ma khyab
NK050(wi)006:1042: bde ba can na sdug bsngal gsum las dang po
NK050(wi)006:1043: gnyis med kyang khyab pa 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal
NK050(wi)006:1044: yod de mi rtag pa yod pa'i phyir zhes dang
NK050(wi)006:1045: longs sku chen po'i zhing khams sdug po bkod pa
NK050(wi)006:1046: las gzhan dbang phyug chen po'i zhing sogs bsam gyis
NK050(wi)006:1047: mi khyab pa thams cad 'dus byas mi rtag par
NK050(wi)006:1048: gsungs so // 'phags pa'i rjes thob sdug bden dang mi 'gal zhing /
NK050(wi)006:1049: ma dag sa bdun man chad theg dman gyis 'jigs pa dang /
NK050(wi)006:1050: dag pa gsum man chad shes sgrib kyis 'jigs pa
NK050(wi)006:1051: yod pa sogs sdug bsngal du gtogs pa'i phyir ro
NK050(wi)006:1052: // lar theg pa mchog gis blo la sbyangs ba
NK050(wi)006:1053: thun mong gi lam la zhen nas 'di nyid bden
NK050(wi)006:1054: gyi gzhan ni ma yin zhes rtog ge smra ba'i
NK050(wi)006:1055: nang du zab don snying po'i gtam sogs bgro gleng
NK050(wi)006:1056: dang rtsod pa byed pa 'os min te snod du
NK050(wi)006:1057: ma gyur pa'i phyir don med pa'i steng nyes par
NK050(wi)006:1058: // 'gyur te / rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las /
NK050(wi)006:1060: chos dang ma rdzogs sems can dang //
NK050(wi)006:1061: rdo rje'i tshig la rtsod pa dag /
NK050(wi)006:1062: sngags pa dam tshig nyams byed pas //
NK050(wi)006:1064: zhes gsungs pa dang tshul 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
NK050(wi)006:1065: de lta bu'i zab don mthar thug snying po 'di
NK050(wi)006:1066: so so skye bo'i sgra rtog gis ji bzhin nges
NK050(wi)006:1069: so sor rang rig tshad med spyod yul ni //
NK050(wi)006:1070: rjod du med cing tha snyad yongs chad pa //
NK050(wi)006:1071: rtsod dang bral ba don dam chos yin te //
NK050(wi)006:1072: de ni rtog ge'i yul las 'das pa'o //
NK050(wi)006:1074: de'i rgyu mtshan yang 'phags pa sa dang po nas
NK050(wi)006:1075: so so rang rig ste rang byung gi ye shes
NK050(wi)006:1076: thob pas chos dbyings kun tu 'gro ba'i don 'di
NK050(wi)006:1078: 'o na rjes dpag gi rig pas ji bzhin mi
NK050(wi)006:1079: rtogs na spros pa 'gog pa'i rtags rnams mi 'thad
NK050(wi)006:1080: ce na / rtog ge'i rjes su dpag pas rang
NK050(wi)006:1081: bzhin yang dag par mi rtog kyang ldog phyogs kyi
NK050(wi)006:1082: sgro 'dogs mngon gyur rags pa sel nus pa'i phyir
NK050(wi)006:1083: rtags don med du mi 'gyur te /
NK050(wi)006:1084: sgra rtog gi blo rnams gzhan sel yin pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)006:1086: des ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul //
NK050(wi)006:1087: de nyid yin par mi 'grub kyang //
NK050(wi)006:1088: de nyid shes pa mi mthun phyogs //
NK050(wi)006:1089: gang yin de ni sel bar byed //
NK050(wi)006:1091: rdo rje'i gnas zab mo 'di su yang rung bas rtogs sla ba zhig yod na /
NK050(wi)006:1092: mdo las sangs rgyas nyag gcig las sa bcu'i 'phags pas kyang ji bzhin mi mthong na /
NK050(wi)006:1093: gzhan so skye dang nyan rang rnams kyis lta ci smos ci'i phyir gsungs /
NK050(wi)006:1094: sngon 'phags yul du slob dpon phyogs glang sogs kyis byams chos gzhan rnams mang bshad mdzad /
NK050(wi)006:1095: rgyud bla ma 'di slob ma bzang shos kha shas
NK050(wi)006:1096: la lkog chos su snyan brgyud byas nas re zhig
NK050(wi)006:1097: 'di'i snod dkon par dgongs te dpe bam gter du
NK050(wi)006:1098: sbas so // phyis su mnga' bdag me tri pas
NK050(wi)006:1099: mchod rten zhig gi bug pa nas 'od 'byung ba
NK050(wi)006:1100: gzigs te ci yod snyoms pa'i btsal nas rnyed pas
NK050(wi)006:1102: lha mo dpal phreng gi mdo las yon tan bshad pa'i skabs su /
NK050(wi)006:1103: sangs rgyas nyid kyi yon tan ni so so'i skye
NK050(wi)006:1104: bo rnams la yang dang po nyid nas rnam par
NK050(wi)006:1105: dbye ba med par gnas pa'i chos yin la /
NK050(wi)006:1106: phyis dri ma bsal bas thob pa yang yin pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
NK050(wi)006:1107: gang gi phyir gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
NK050(wi)006:1108: shes mtha' dag rjes su ma zhugs pa'i sems can
NK050(wi)006:1109: de ni sems can gyi ris na 'ga' yang med
NK050(wi)006:1110: do // 'on kyang 'du shes kyi 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mi mngon no //
NK050(wi)006:1111: 'du shes kyi 'dzin pa dang bral ba las ni
NK050(wi)006:1112: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rang byung gi ye shes thogs
NK050(wi)006:1113: pa med par rab tu 'byung ngo //
NK050(wi)006:1115: mdo phal po che las kyang /
NK050(wi)006:1116: stong gsum dar yug chen po'i dpes sems can la
NK050(wi)006:1117: rgyal ba'i ye shes yod pa bsam gyis mi khyab
NK050(wi)006:1119: des na rgyal ba'i yum las /
NK050(wi)006:1120: lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung
NK050(wi)006:1121: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste
NK050(wi)006:1122: mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings de ni de bzhin du
NK050(wi)006:1123: gnas so // mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings ji lta
NK050(wi)006:1124: bzhin du gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas
NK050(wi)006:1125: ma nor bar mngon par sangs rgyas te /
NK050(wi)006:1126: de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
NK050(wi)006:1128: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni ye nas ma skyes pa dang ma 'gag pa dang /
NK050(wi)006:1130: ye shes snang ba rgyan gyi mdo las /
NK050(wi)006:1131: rtag tu skye med chos ni de bzhin gshegs //
NK050(wi)006:1132: chos rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs dang 'dra //
NK050(wi)006:1133: byis pa'i blo can mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams //
NK050(wi)006:1134: 'jig rten na ni med pa'i chos la spyod //
NK050(wi)006:1136: de ltar yang phyin ci log tu yun ring por
NK050(wi)006:1137: goms pas gnas lugs bdag med gnyis kyi rang bzhin
NK050(wi)006:1138: bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po lhan skyes su yod
NK050(wi)006:1139: pa de mi mthong bar don la med pa bdag
NK050(wi)006:1140: gnyis su snang ba'i 'khrul pa glo bur la bden
NK050(wi)006:1141: par spyod pa ni mun pa las kyang mun pa
NK050(wi)006:1144: gang zhig yod pa mi mthong med mthong ba //
NK050(wi)006:1145: 'di 'dra'i mun nag rnam pa de gang zhig /
NK050(wi)006:1147: rang la da lta ye shes mngon par yod pa
NK050(wi)006:1148: ma mthong ba tsam gyis med pa mi 'grub pa'i
NK050(wi)006:1149: phyir / lung la yid ches te dang po dad pa bsgrub par bya dgos so //
NK050(wi)006:1151: gang zhig nga yi tshig la yid ches te //
NK050(wi)006:1152: rgyal ba'i ye shes phung po dbang byas shing //
NK050(wi)006:1153: sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen ces tshig tu brjod //
NK050(wi)006:1154: bdag gi bden pa'i tshig la yid ches mdzod //
NK050(wi)006:1156: 'di lta bu zab mo'i chos dang sangs rgyas la
NK050(wi)006:1157: the tshom med pa'i dad pa dang ldan pas rtogs
NK050(wi)006:1158: par gsungs te / thar pa'i rgyu la mtha' yas
NK050(wi)006:1159: kyang dad pa rtsa bar bstan pa ni dam pa'i
NK050(wi)006:1160: chos snang ba'i sgo ste gtso che bar dgongs la
NK050(wi)006:1161: dad pa med na sangs rgyas dang des chos la
NK050(wi)006:1163: dad pa yod kyang shes rab yang dag pa med
NK050(wi)006:1164: na chos kyi rang bzhin ci bzhin mi shes pas
NK050(wi)006:1165: sgro 'dogs pa la sogs pa'i shes rab 'chal ba'i
NK050(wi)006:1167: lhag bsam brten pa'i mdo las /
NK050(wi)006:1168: sh+aa ri'i bu don dam pa ni dad pas rtogs par bya ba yin no //
NK050(wi)006:1171: rang byung rnams kyi don dam de //
NK050(wi)006:1172: dad pa nyid kyi rtogs bya yin //
NK050(wi)006:1174: de la dgongs nas 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis /
NK050(wi)006:1175: dad can nyid phyir chos la brten //
NK050(wi)006:1176: shes rab ldan phyir yang dag rig /
NK050(wi)006:1177: 'di gnyis gtso bo shes rab ste //
NK050(wi)006:1178: de yi sngon 'gro dad pa yin //
NK050(wi)006:1180: mkhas pa blo sbyangs pa dag gis yang dag par
NK050(wi)006:1181: rtogs la gzhan ni yod med sna tshogs kyi gzhir
NK050(wi)006:1184: chos dbyings rnam pa thams cad du //
NK050(wi)006:1186: byis pa rnams ni de la 'khrul //
NK050(wi)006:1187: blo sbyangs pas ni yang dag rtogs //
NK050(wi)006:1191: dngos po med cing dmigs su med //
NK050(wi)006:1192: thams cad stong pa gnas med pa //
NK050(wi)006:1193: spros pa rnams las yang dag 'das //
NK050(wi)006:1194: byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid yin //
NK050(wi)006:1196: chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sems de ni byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o //
NK050(wi)006:1197: zhes gsungs pa ltar theg chen gyi mdo rnams su
NK050(wi)006:1198: snying po 'di la byang chub dang byang chub kyi
NK050(wi)006:1199: sems dang / byang chub kyi snying po zhes kyang
NK050(wi)006:1200: gsungs pa 'di nyid mngon du gyur pa dang ma
NK050(wi)006:1201: gyur pa las sangs rgyas dang sems can zhes rjod
NK050(wi)006:1202: sems dang / kyi / gzhan gyi ye shes gzhan
NK050(wi)006:1203: gyi rgyud la 'phos nas byang chub pa ni ma
NK050(wi)006:1206: byang chub ring min nye ba'ang min //
NK050(wi)006:1208: nyon mongs gyur min 'di nyid las //
NK050(wi)006:1209: mthong ba dang ni ma mthong min //
NK050(wi)006:1212: de phyir thar pa nor tsam zad pa yin //
NK050(wi)006:1214: de ltar nges don bder gshegs snying po de nyid
NK050(wi)006:1215: lung rig man ngag gis ji ltar bsgrubs pa rnams
NK050(wi)006:1217: rgyu bsags pa rnams ni cung zad thos pas don 'grub ste /
NK050(wi)006:1218: dge 'dun srungs kyis chos bstan pa la drang srong
NK050(wi)006:1219: rnams kyis phag nyan byas pas 'bras bu thob pa
NK050(wi)006:1220: bzhin no // sngon sbyangs dman pa rang re las
NK050(wi)006:1221: dang po pa tshul min yid byed goms pa dag
NK050(wi)006:1222: ni yod med so sor bstan na rtag chad du
NK050(wi)006:1223: bzhin no // 'dzin la / zung 'jug tu smras
NK050(wi)006:1224: na yod med gnyis lhan cig bsgril ba lta bu
NK050(wi)006:1225: las don gyi bab dang mthun pa zhig 'ong dka'
NK050(wi)006:1226: bzhin no // 'dzin la / ba'i phyir / phung
NK050(wi)006:1227: lnga'i gzeb tu ye shes btsal bas mi rnyed de
NK050(wi)006:1228: tha snyad ni rnam shes dbang btsan pa'i gnas lugs
NK050(wi)006:1229: dang mi mthun la don dam dpyod ngor ni ci
NK050(wi)006:1230: yang grub pa med pa'i phyir ngal ba yin no
NK050(wi)006:1232: de bas na dang po thun mong gi lam yan
NK050(wi)006:1233: chad nas thos pa mang dgos te /
NK050(wi)006:1235: mi 'jig pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste chos rnams rnam par 'byed pa'o //
NK050(wi)006:1236: dbang chung ba rnams kyi tha ma ni 'di lta ste gang thos pa nyung ba'o //
NK050(wi)006:1238: gang mang du thos pa ni ri'am rgya mtsho ltar nga rgyal che'o //
NK050(wi)006:1239: zhes kyang gsungs te de la tshig gi nga rgyal
NK050(wi)006:1240: tsam spang bya sla ste zas dug pa bzhin don
NK050(wi)006:1241: gyi sman myang bas sel la /
NK050(wi)006:1242: don gyi nga rgyal ni spang bya phra ste sman
NK050(wi)006:1243: dug tu gyur pa bzhin yin pas yon tan skye
NK050(wi)006:1244: ba'i gegs nga rgyal bcom zhing snying rje byang chub
NK050(wi)006:1245: sems kyi grogs su byas nas thos sogs kyis sems
NK050(wi)006:1248: rgyu gsum dag gis lpags pa las su rung bar
NK050(wi)006:1249: 'gyur te snum bsku ba dang mnye ba dang bsro
NK050(wi)006:1251: de bzhin du sems kyang thos pa dang bsam pa dang sgom pa rnams kyis so //
NK050(wi)006:1253: dper na rdo thal mes bsreg chus 'jig pa bzhin /
NK050(wi)006:1254: bag la nyal ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rdo shes rab
NK050(wi)006:1255: kyi mes bsreg ting nge 'dzin gyi chus spang na
NK050(wi)006:1256: 'jig go gsungs / me lta bu'i shes rab kyang
NK050(wi)006:1257: thos pa las 'byung la thos pa'i don ma shes
NK050(wi)006:1258: na tshig gi khur thogs kyang don mngon par mi
NK050(wi)006:1259: 'jig go gsungs / thob ste / khye'u'i mgul du gter gyi kha byang btags pa dang 'dra'o //
NK050(wi)006:1260: tshig ni don mtshon byed de mun khang gi gser sgron mes 'tshol ba ltar ro //
NK050(wi)006:1261: des na thos pa las don dang don lag len du theg pa gal che ste /
NK050(wi)006:1262: mel tshe ba so sor mi rtog pa ni ma nyal zhes zer bzhin du chom pos bcom mo //
NK050(wi)006:1263: de bzhin du sgra tsam la brtson pa'i mang du
NK050(wi)006:1264: thos pa so sor mi rtog pa yang nyon mongs
NK050(wi)006:1265: pa'i dgra rnams kyis bcom mo //
NK050(wi)006:1266: so sor rtog pa de yang don shes pa las 'byung bas don gzung bar bya'o //
NK050(wi)006:1267: de bzhin du rol mo mkhan rkun po'i 'jigs nas
NK050(wi)006:1268: mi nyal bar bya ba'i phyir glu len bzhin du
NK050(wi)006:1269: bcom pa ltar / chos 'chad nyan glu len pa
NK050(wi)006:1270: lta bu byed bzhin du nyon mongs pas bcom mo
NK050(wi)006:1271: bcom pa ltar / // gzhan yang dkon mchog brtsegs pa las /
NK050(wi)006:1272: mi zhig rgya mtshos khyer ba skom bzhin du shi ba ltar /
NK050(wi)006:1273: kha cig chos mang po la bslab ste kun chub
NK050(wi)006:1274: par byas kyang dug gsum la sred pa mi sel
NK050(wi)006:1275: ba de dag chos kyi rgya mtshos khyer la /
NK050(wi)006:1276: nyon mongs pas skom pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)006:1278: drag shul can gyis zhus pa las /
NK050(wi)006:1279: gal te mang du thos pa dal ba phun sum
NK050(wi)006:1280: tshogs pa 'di rnyed nas rnyed pa la sogs pa
NK050(wi)006:1281: la chags pa'i sems mi sbyongs na de lha dang
NK050(wi)006:1282: bcas pa'i 'jig rten la bslu ba gcig pur 'gyur
NK050(wi)006:1284: tshig gi tha snyad na yam mang po bsam zhing
NK050(wi)006:1285: shes pa bkra yas pa ni don dngos dang 'gal
NK050(wi)006:1286: ba la mchog tu 'dzin pa'i shes rab nyon mongs
NK050(wi)006:1287: can te shes 'chal du gyur pas rang rig 'od
NK050(wi)006:1288: gsal snying po la sgrib pa gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i
NK050(wi)006:1289: rgyu byed par gsungs pa dang /
NK050(wi)006:1290: thos don nyams su ma blang ba'i kha bshad tsam ni nyes pa can gyi smra ba ste /
NK050(wi)006:1292: thos pas brgyags nas gus par mi 'gyur te //
NK050(wi)006:1293: rnam par 'gyed pa'i smra ba rnams la chags //
NK050(wi)006:1294: brjed par 'gyur zhing shes bzhin med par 'gyur //
NK050(wi)006:1295: smra la dga' ba'i nyes pa 'di dag go //
NK050(wi)006:1296: zhes sogs mang du gsungs nas /
NK050(wi)006:1297: yun ring dus nas smra la dga' bas na //
NK050(wi)006:1298: des ni bdag nyid dga' ba mi thob ste //
NK050(wi)006:1299: tshig gang dga' ba mtha' yas thob 'gyur ba //
NK050(wi)006:1300: tshig gcig tsam zhig bsams kyang mchog yin no //
NK050(wi)006:1302: yang de las tshig rjes 'brang ba dang /
NK050(wi)006:1304: bu ram shing shun snying po ci yang med //
NK050(wi)006:1305: dga' bar bya ba'i ro ni nang na 'dug /
NK050(wi)006:1306: shun pa zos pa'i mis ni bu ram ro //
NK050(wi)006:1307: zhim po rnyed par nus pa ma yin no //
NK050(wi)006:1308: ji ltar shun pa de bzhin smra ba ste //
NK050(wi)006:1309: ro lta bu ni 'di la don sems yin //
NK050(wi)006:1310: de lta bas na smra la dga' spang ste //
NK050(wi)006:1311: rtag tu bag yod byos la don soms shig /
NK050(wi)006:1314: thos pas mi shes sgom pas shes //
NK050(wi)006:1317: yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa las /
NK050(wi)006:1318: stong pa zhi ba skye ba med pa'i tshul //
NK050(wi)006:1319: mi shes pas ni 'gro ba 'khyams gyur te //
NK050(wi)006:1320: de dag thugs rje mnga' bas thabs tshul gyis //
NK050(wi)006:1321: rig pa brgya dag gis ni gzung bar mdzad //
NK050(wi)006:1324: rab tu btsal na mi dmigs chos //
NK050(wi)006:1325: sems la dngos por mi snang bas //
NK050(wi)006:1326: chos nyid legs par shes pa yi //
NK050(wi)006:1327: blo ldan byang chub thob par 'gyur //
NK050(wi)006:1329: 'khrul pa'i sems sems byung yul dang bcas pa yang
NK050(wi)006:1330: dag pa'i lung dang gcig tu bral la sogs pa'i
NK050(wi)006:1331: rigs pa du mas tshul bzhin du dpyad de gtan
NK050(wi)006:1332: la phab na / snang tsam las don dam par
NK050(wi)006:1333: bden dngos kyi rnam pa ci yang grub pa med
NK050(wi)006:1334: pa'i nges pa mi skye mi srid la /
NK050(wi)006:1335: de yang dmigs gtad can gyi sgom pa gzhan dang
NK050(wi)006:1336: mi 'dra bas srid rtsa hrul por byed par bshad
NK050(wi)006:1337: do // lha'i bus zhus pa las /
NK050(wi)006:1339: 'jam dpal byang chen brjed nges pa gang mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnam grangs yod dam /
NK050(wi)006:1340: lha'i bu yod de byang chen gang la la rmi
NK050(wi)006:1341: lam du yang don dam par rdzas dang ngo bo
NK050(wi)006:1342: dang dngos po'i sems mi skye ba de ni mi
NK050(wi)006:1343: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu mnyam par bzhag par
NK050(wi)006:1345: bden zhen ma spangs na brjed pa med par mnyam par bzhag kyang g.yeng ba dang 'dra'o //
NK050(wi)006:1348: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa ni
NK050(wi)006:1349: rnam par rtog pa'o zhes bden 'dzin gyi rnam par
NK050(wi)006:1350: rtog pa la sogs pa la nyon mongs pa zhes
NK050(wi)006:1351: spang bya'i gtso bor gsungs pa dang /
NK050(wi)006:1353: sems dang sems byung khams gsum pa //
NK050(wi)006:1354: sgro btags rnam pa can rtog yin //
NK050(wi)006:1355: de dag 'ching ba'i rgyu nyid du //
NK050(wi)006:1356: zhes khams gsum gyis bsdus pa'i sgro btags kyi rtog pa sna tshogs pa rnams dang /
NK050(wi)006:1358: dngos dngos med dang sgro 'dogs dang skur 'deb gcig dang tha dad ngo bo nyid dang khyad par /
NK050(wi)006:1359: ming ji lta ba bzhin don dang don ji lta
NK050(wi)006:1360: ba bzhin ming du rtog pa ste rnam g.yeng gi
NK050(wi)006:1361: rtog pa bcu gsungs pa dang /
NK050(wi)006:1363: rnam rtog ma rig chen po ste //
NK050(wi)006:1364: 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung byed yin //
NK050(wi)006:1365: mi rtog ting 'dzin la gnas na //
NK050(wi)006:1366: mkha' bzhin dri ma med pa 'byung //
NK050(wi)006:1368: sems rang dbang du gnas su mi btub pa'i gnyid
NK050(wi)006:1369: 'gyod rtog dpyod de gzhan 'gyur bzhi las rtog dpyod
NK050(wi)006:1370: mang ba dngos gzhi thob pa'i gegs su gsungs pas
NK050(wi)006:1371: mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye ba'i phyir rnam rtog
NK050(wi)006:1372: thams cad spangs nas sgom pa dngos la 'jug par
NK050(wi)006:1373: bya'o // de'i phyir mdo sde rgyan las /
NK050(wi)006:1374: gal te ma thos pa yang sgom 'jug 'gyur na bstan pa don med 'gyur //
NK050(wi)006:1375: gal te thos pa tsam gyis don mthong 'gyur na sgom pa don med 'gyur //
NK050(wi)006:1376: de ltar bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa de yang don med min //
NK050(wi)006:1377: de ltar rnal 'byor can gyi sgom pa de yang don med min //
NK050(wi)006:1380: gdams ngag med par bsam gtan byed na 'gal tshab can du 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)006:1381: zhes gsungs pas brgyud ldan gyi bla ma byin rlabs
NK050(wi)006:1382: can gyi gdams ngag thob na mchog tu 'gyur te
NK050(wi)006:1383: / rgyang ring po'i 'bod skad las tshig don ji bzhin nges dka' ba ltar /
NK050(wi)006:1384: sgra tshig mang po la yun ring ngal ba las
NK050(wi)006:1385: gnas lugs mi rtog pa'i ye shes bde blag tu
NK050(wi)006:1386: nges pa ni bla ma'i man ngag la rag las
NK050(wi)006:1387: pa'i phyir zab pa yin te sngar yang bshad do
NK050(wi)006:1388: // mi rtog pa'i ye shes dngos mos spyod na med kyang de dang rjes mthun pa yod de /
NK050(wi)006:1389: tshogs lam na go ba spyi'i 'od gsal sbyor lam
NK050(wi)006:1390: na myong ba dpe'i 'od gsal mthong lam na rtogs
NK050(wi)006:1391: pa don gyi 'od gasalazhesa bya ba dang /
NK050(wi)006:1393: mar ngo'i bcu bzhi'i zla ba'i dpes mos pa'i spyod
NK050(wi)006:1394: pa rnams la yang 'od gsal chos sku cung zad
NK050(wi)006:1396: des na don de dag khong du chud par byas
NK050(wi)006:1397: nas so sos skye bo'i lta ba ni rjes dpag
NK050(wi)006:1398: gis don spyi la dmigs nas skyong dgos pas gong
NK050(wi)006:1399: du bshad pa'i dpyad mthas stong pa'i nges pa de
NK050(wi)006:1400: la 'dris pa'i dngos po zhes brjed pa med par
NK050(wi)006:1401: yang yang goms dgos pas sems byung gi dran pa
NK050(wi)006:1402: 'das pa'i yul can dang dran pas zin ma zin
NK050(wi)006:1403: brtag pa'i bya ra ba lta bu da lta'i yul
NK050(wi)006:1404: can shes bzhin dang mi 'bral ba'i sgo nas rang
NK050(wi)006:1405: bzhin med pa'i 'dzin stangs 'di gal che ste /
NK050(wi)006:1406: 'dod pa'i sar ma phyin par du lam dang skyel
NK050(wi)006:1407: ma 'dor du mi rung ba bzhin dang ye nas
NK050(wi)006:1408: yod 'dzin goms pa'i dngos gnyen so sor rtog pa'i
NK050(wi)006:1410: spang bya dang 'gal ba'i 'dzin rtog de nyid yod
NK050(wi)006:1411: tshe mi mthun phyogs zil gyis mnan nas mi skye
NK050(wi)006:1412: ba'i phyir ro // de yang go ba la brten
NK050(wi)006:1413: nas dpyad sgom gyi dus su rang bzhin med pa'i
NK050(wi)006:1414: don spyi blo la snang tsam las nges pa med
NK050(wi)006:1415: kyang ring du goms pas nges shes phu thag chod
NK050(wi)006:1416: ba'i phyir ro // pa skye la / de nas
NK050(wi)006:1417: lta ba'i dpyad sgom shugs chung ngur 'gyur bas mi
NK050(wi)006:1418: rtog par 'jog pa dang spel mar bya dgos gsungs
NK050(wi)006:1419: ba'i phyir ro // pa skye la / / des
NK050(wi)006:1420: na rtsubs shing grtsubs pa'i dpe ltar rtog pa la
NK050(wi)006:1421: brten nas res 'jog med par sgom pa rgyun bsring
NK050(wi)006:1422: na myur du rtog med mngon sum gyi gsal snang
NK050(wi)006:1423: ba'i phyir ro // pa skye la / / skye ste / slob dpon dpa' bos /
NK050(wi)006:1425: bsam gtan bsgrub la brtson par bya //
NK050(wi)006:1426: yang dang yang du ngal bsos na //
NK050(wi)006:1428: rnal 'byor tshul la'ang de bzhin du //
NK050(wi)006:1429: khyab par ma thob btang mi bya //
NK050(wi)006:1431: de lta bu'i tshul gyis gnas lugs la goms cha
NK050(wi)006:1432: thon pas phyi nang gi snang rtog thams cad brtan
NK050(wi)006:1433: pa med pa gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa'i nyams kyang
NK050(wi)006:1435: ci yang med ces goms pas ni //
NK050(wi)006:1436: de yang phyi nas spong bar 'gyur //
NK050(wi)006:1437: zhes med 'dzin gyi rtog pa de spang byar bshad
NK050(wi)006:1438: pas bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin rang 'gags su
NK050(wi)006:1439: 'gyur te / so so rang rig mi rtog pa'i
NK050(wi)006:1440: ye shes kyis gnas lugs mngon sum du gyur pa
NK050(wi)006:1441: la rtog pa'i zhen yul mi 'thad pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)006:1442: sngar thos bsam gyis dpyad pa'i rtog pa ni skabs der mi srid do //
NK050(wi)006:1443: 'dir kha cig gis rang blo la ma ltos par
NK050(wi)006:1444: thun mong ma yin pa'i man ngag can blo rab
NK050(wi)006:1445: kha cig gi sgom pa la 'gren te /
NK050(wi)006:1446: dang po nyid nas rtog med du 'jog dgos kyi
NK050(wi)006:1447: rtog pa bsgoms pas blo de'i rgyun rtog med du
NK050(wi)006:1449: 'o na blo yul la 'jug tshul la rtog pa
NK050(wi)006:1450: sel ba'i sgo nas dang rtog med snang ba'i sgo
NK050(wi)006:1452: de lta na rtog med kho na sgom pa las
NK050(wi)006:1453: rtog pa ci tsam goms par byas kyang yul gyi
NK050(wi)006:1454: don mngon sum gsal bar snang ba mi srid par
NK050(wi)006:1456: slob dpon chos kyi grags pas /
NK050(wi)006:1457: mi gtsang zad par sa la sogs //
NK050(wi)006:1458: yang dag min pa'ang bsgoms pa yi //
NK050(wi)006:1459: stobs kyis sprul pa rtog med dang //
NK050(wi)006:1460: gsal bar snang ba can du mthong //
NK050(wi)006:1461: zhes gsungs pa dang yang 'gal lo //
NK050(wi)006:1462: 'ang gi sgrus yang dag pa ma zad ces bsdu'o //
NK050(wi)006:1463: 'di 'dra sngon dus hwa shang gi grub mtha' cig car ba'i lam dang yid byed bkag cing /
NK050(wi)006:1464: sprin dkar nag gnyis kas nam mkha' sgrib pa'i dpes
NK050(wi)006:1465: dge sdig gnyis kyang don mthong ba la sgrib par
NK050(wi)006:1466: bshad pas / las dang po pa rnams chad ltar gol bar mkhyen nas slob dpon k+aa sh+ai dang /
NK050(wi)006:1468: rba ye shes dbang po sogs kyis tshar bcad zin to //
NK050(wi)006:1469: yang rtog ge la gces spras kyis 'bral mi phod pa kha cig /
NK050(wi)006:1470: chos nyid mngon sum mthong yang nges shes kyi 'dzin stangs gal che zhes smra'o //
NK050(wi)006:1472: gang yang bsgom bya'i don de'i rang mtshan yul dus
NK050(wi)006:1473: gzhan dang ma 'dres par gsal bar shar yang rtog
NK050(wi)006:1475: phyi rol bas dbang shes rtog par 'dod pa de
NK050(wi)006:1476: bkag nas de'i ngor rtog med du sgrub dka' bar
NK050(wi)006:1478: rnal 'byor rnams kyi bla mas bstan //
NK050(wi)006:1479: ma 'dres pa yi don tsam mthong //
NK050(wi)006:1481: stong nyid don spyi'i rnam pa rtog ngor shar ba
NK050(wi)006:1482: de nyid yun ring du goms pas goms yul gsal
NK050(wi)006:1483: bar mthong ba rnal 'byor mngon sum la thug go
NK050(wi)006:1484: // de sgrub pa'i rtags kyi mthun dpe lung snga ma las /
NK050(wi)006:1486: kun po rmi sogs kyis bslad pas //
NK050(wi)006:1487: mdun na gnas pa bzhin du ni //
NK050(wi)006:1488: yang dag min pa'ang mthong bar 'gyur //
NK050(wi)006:1489: zhes gsungs pa'i shes byed kyis tshul mtshungs par sgrub nus so //
NK050(wi)006:1490: chos nyid rtog ge'i mi 'grub pa gong du'ang bshad la /
NK050(wi)006:1492: gang zhig rtog ge'i lam nas chos nyid la khrid na //
NK050(wi)006:1493: thub pa'i bstan las ches bsring nyams par byas pa yin //
NK050(wi)006:1496: dam pa'i don gyi rtog pa la'ang //
NK050(wi)006:1497: mkhas pas der ni gnas mi bya //
NK050(wi)006:1498: dge ba'am mi dge ba yi yang //
NK050(wi)006:1499: rtog la bye brag ci zhig yod //
NK050(wi)006:1500: rten gyi dbye ba la brten pa'i //
NK050(wi)006:1501: me sreg nyid du bye brag med //
NK050(wi)006:1502: tsan dan gyi ni me yis kyang //
NK050(wi)006:1503: reg pa tsam gyis bsreg pa nyid //
NK050(wi)006:1504: rnam par rtog pa chung ngu yang //
NK050(wi)006:1505: thams cad nyid du spang bar bya //
NK050(wi)006:1507: de'i rjes su smra ba la /
NK050(wi)006:1508: 'o na chad lta'o zhes kha cig thag thag rgod
NK050(wi)006:1509: kyang rang blo skyon du gyur pa la rgod rigs
NK050(wi)006:1510: mod / gzhan gyi yon tan la bltas nas rgod
NK050(wi)006:1511: khul byed pa ni de bas kyang bzhad gad kyi
NK050(wi)006:1512: mod / gnas te / sa pan gyis /
NK050(wi)006:1513: spre'u rgan rnams kyis mi bzung nas //
NK050(wi)006:1514: mjug ma med ces bzhad gad byed //
NK050(wi)006:1515: tsi ta'i yul du phyin pa yi //
NK050(wi)006:1516: rkang gnyis pa la mir mi brtsi //
NK050(wi)006:1517: zhes gsungs pa ji lta ba bzhin no //
NK050(wi)006:1518: sngon pha dam pas rang byung lhan skyes kyi ye
NK050(wi)006:1519: shes sgrub rgyud snying po'i bstan pa rgya nag tu
NK050(wi)006:1520: spel tshe / rgya nag pas tsung men nam tsi
NK050(wi)006:1521: 'an me zhes don brgyud pa'am rim gyis pa zer
NK050(wi)006:1522: spel tshe / / yul de'i thos pa ba dag gis chad lta ba zhes 'dogs pa ltar ro //
