NK050(wi)006:1523: 'di sangs rgyas bskyang dang gcig ces gleng /
NK050(wi)006:1524: gang ltar yang klu sgrub kyi slob ma tshe la dbang ba'i grub thob cig go //
NK050(wi)006:1527: stong pa nyid la blta nyes na //
NK050(wi)006:1528: shes rab chung rnams phong bar 'gyur //
NK050(wi)006:1531: phung 'di stong zhes rtogs na'ang byang chub sems dpa' ni //
NK050(wi)006:1532: mtshan ma la spyod skye med gnas la dad ma yin //
NK050(wi)006:1534: ji ltar dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas bzang za ba //
NK050(wi)006:1535: dkar po'i chos la dmigs pa'ang de 'drar rgyal bas gsungs //
NK050(wi)006:1537: nam zhig dran rtog las 'das te dbyings dang ye
NK050(wi)006:1538: shes chos nyid gcig tu 'dres pa'i rnal 'byor gyi
NK050(wi)006:1539: sa la phyin tshe dran rig 'od gsal chen po
NK050(wi)006:1541: rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
NK050(wi)006:1542: ni dran pa med cing yid la byar med pa
NK050(wi)006:1545: tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa las /
NK050(wi)006:1546: gang chos thams cad la mi dran zhing yid la
NK050(wi)006:1547: mi byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
NK050(wi)006:1549: gang dran pa de la gnas pa de ni mtshan ma thams cad la mi gnas pa'o //
NK050(wi)006:1551: gang yid la byed pa ni mi dge ba'o //
NK050(wi)006:1552: zhes kyang gsungs pas dran rtsol med pa nam mkha'i dbyings lta bur 'jog pa'o //
NK050(wi)006:1553: de yang bying nyams ltar thom me ba ma yin te /
NK050(wi)006:1555: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa thams cad
NK050(wi)006:1556: dang bral yang ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyang 'dor
NK050(wi)006:1559: de nas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rang
NK050(wi)006:1560: byung lhun gyis grub pa de ye nas dbyings kyi
NK050(wi)006:1561: gdangs mkhyen cha 'gag med du yod pa nyid sa
NK050(wi)006:1562: bon las myu gu mthong ba'am /
NK050(wi)006:1563: tshes kyi zla ba ltar gsal snang gong 'phel du song ba yin nam /
NK050(wi)006:1564: sngar med pa zhig thos sogs kyis bskyed nas gsar
NK050(wi)006:1565: du byung ba yin snyam pa'i the tshom dang rtsod
NK050(wi)006:1566: pa thams cad ngang gis zhi bar 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)006:1567: zhes rdo rje'i gnas 'dir mos pa lam byed 'dod
NK050(wi)006:1568: pa dag gi ched du zhar byung du bkod pa'o
NK050(wi)006:1569: // de ltar dgag bzhag gi rnam pa dag gi
NK050(wi)006:1570: skyes mchog snga ma rnams la zhus pa min te
NK050(wi)006:1571: chos kyi spyan ldan rnams ni dgos pa'i dbang gis
NK050(wi)006:1572: dgongs pa can gyi gsung srid pa'i phyir ro //
NK050(wi)006:1573: gzhan du gong ma'i rjes zlos mi 'khyol bzhin du
NK050(wi)006:1574: snying nad 'ba' zhig gis chos dang gang zag la
NK050(wi)006:1575: sgro skur 'dod nas 'chal gtam gyis rgool khul byed
NK050(wi)006:1577: nges don rgya mtsho'i snying po zer brgya pa //
NK050(wi)006:1578: chos dbyings 'chi med klong nas rang shar bas //
NK050(wi)006:1579: me khyer mun par gyur dang lhan cig tu //
NK050(wi)006:1580: dga' ston rgyal rnga bzang po 'di brdung ngo //
NK050(wi)006:1581: dus gsum rgyal ba'i chos 'khor ji snyed pa'i //
NK050(wi)006:1582: brjod bya mthar thug snying po 'di kho na //
NK050(wi)006:1583: rgyal ba nyid las ji bzhin 'phags pas kyang //
NK050(wi)006:1584: bsam par dka' na gzhan gyis lta ci smos //
NK050(wi)006:1585: zung 'jug 'od gsal 'di la phyogs zhen pas //
NK050(wi)006:1586: sgro skur lta ba mchog 'dzin lam ngan la //
NK050(wi)006:1587: ngal ba'i byis rnams rang byung ye shes dngos //
NK050(wi)006:1588: rnyed pa'i re ba srid mtha' ma khegs tsam //
NK050(wi)006:1589: gsang chen dkyil 'khor zhugs nas shes 'chal gyi //
NK050(wi)006:1590: dug 'thung gnyen pos ma chun phrag dog gi //
NK050(wi)006:1591: dgra stas thar pa'i ljon pa btub pa'i rdul //
NK050(wi)006:1592: 'gam gyin mi'u thung zol gyis lha gral rgyug /
NK050(wi)006:1593: nga rgyal dbugs kyi gang ba'i mgo 'phang can //
NK050(wi)006:1594: the tshom snying la bcings nas sgrogs 'gros bcas //
NK050(wi)006:1595: tshul min lam la 'khyogs shing ngal bzhin rgyu //
NK050(wi)006:1596: don chen bzod pa'ang sgyu ma'i rnam thar yin //
NK050(wi)006:1597: gzugs dang lang tshos dman yang mkhyen pa'i gdangs //
NK050(wi)006:1598: mthon po'i skal bar son pa'i grags cha yis //
NK050(wi)006:1599: zla ba'i dpal yang 'gran pa'i sma phab na //
NK050(wi)006:1600: spyi brdol mun pas khengs rnams lta yang ci //
NK050(wi)006:1601: don 'di byis blo'i yul las ring 'das kyang //
NK050(wi)006:1602: yang dag lung rig man ngag lde mig gis //
NK050(wi)006:1603: rdo rje gsang sgo dbye la 'khrul shes pas //
NK050(wi)006:1604: sbas par bzhugs pa'i dbyar ngo mjal 'tshal lo //
NK050(wi)006:1605: chu zla'i rnam rol bzhin du dngos rnams la //
NK050(wi)006:1606: bden par med dang bden med snang ba gnyis //
NK050(wi)006:1607: dbyer med phyogs lhung bral ba bden gnyis gshis //
NK050(wi)006:1608: nges pa'i blo la gang yang grogs su 'char //
NK050(wi)006:1609: dngos snang rtog pa'i dbang gyur sgyu ma'i tshul //
NK050(wi)006:1610: med bzhin snang ba rten cing 'brel 'byung la //
NK050(wi)006:1611: yod med brtag nas rgyu 'bras zhen blo can //
NK050(wi)006:1612: gang gi nges don g.yo zol tshig tu gyer //
NK050(wi)006:1613: dbyings kyi ngang na rgyu 'bras spros med kyang //
NK050(wi)006:1614: blang dor 'jig rten tshul bzhin dpyod byed kyi //
NK050(wi)006:1615: shes rab spyan ldan 'phags la'ang mdza' lags na //
NK050(wi)006:1616: ci slad dpang po nyid du mi 'dzin nam //
NK050(wi)006:1617: de bas dad pa'i khams dang dngos mthun pa'i //
NK050(wi)006:1618: gang gi byin chen 'khrigs pa'i char zim gyis //
NK050(wi)006:1619: legs par bkrus pa'i mngon rtogs sgeg pa'i chos //
NK050(wi)006:1620: nang gi yid la mdza' ba'i dpal du 'gyur //
NK050(wi)006:1621: srin bya rgan po khro mig ce re yis //
NK050(wi)006:1622: nyin mthong zol gyis hong sgra lhung re sgrogs //
NK050(wi)006:1623: dgra zla byung ba stug pa 'thor bzhin 'bro //
NK050(wi)006:1624: de bas mun khung nyal na rang lugs btsan //
NK050(wi)006:1625: dus gsum legs byas snang ba mchis so 'tshal //
NK050(wi)006:1626: rgyal bas yongs bsngo mkhyen pa rjes dran te //
NK050(wi)006:1627: de bzhin 'khor gsum zhen pa'i dug spangs nas //
NK050(wi)006:1628: smon med ngang nas snying rjes 'gro la bsngo //
NK050(wi)006:1629: spobs pa'i gter brgyad thob pa'i lung rig gi //
NK050(wi)006:1630: dbyar rnga'i log par 'khyams pa'i sa ku rtsi //
NK050(wi)006:1631: mun pa'i dbyings su sbas pa'i rgyang grags kyi //
NK050(wi)006:1632: mu khyud gling bzhir 'khor bas mdzes gyur cig /
NK050(wi)006:1633: rmad byung theg pa'i mchog rtse rdo rje chos //
NK050(wi)006:1634: gang la mnyam par bzhag pa'i dpal thob nas //
NK050(wi)006:1635: sna tshogs lam gyi basngagasa pas mi 'phrog pas //
NK050(wi)006:1636: nye lam srid mthar 'bar ba'i gsos su shog /
NK050(wi)006:1637: dbugs can 'gro ba yongs kyi rab dag'i dpyid //
NK050(wi)006:1638: dam chos zla ba bdud rtsi'i snying po can //
NK050(wi)006:1639: gdung sems rmongs pa'i dgra zla gcig pu de //
NK050(wi)006:1640: 'gog med srid pa'i mthar yang snang gyur cig /
NK050(wi)006:1641: ces pa 'adi'ang bshad sgrub bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan nam
NK050(wi)006:1642: bsod chos ming pas brag lha rdzong 'chi med ri
NK050(wi)006:1643: khrod yon tan kun 'byung dga' ba'i tshal nas thun
NK050(wi)006:1644: mtshams kha shas su bris pa'o //
NK050(wi)006:1646: theg mchog nges don snying po dbu ma'i lam //
NK050(wi)006:1647: gsal zhing go bde legs par bshad pa 'di //
NK050(wi)006:1648: 'dzad med chos char bdud rtsi 'bum 'byin pas //
NK050(wi)006:1649: rnam dpyod ku mud 'dzum pa'i zla ba gsar //
NK050(wi)006:1650: dpal gyi ming gis spar du bkod pa'i dges //
NK050(wi)006:1651: 'brel thogs kun bcas 'gro kun theg mchog gi //
NK050(wi)006:1652: lam zhugs byang chub snying po myur thob nas //
NK050(wi)006:1653: sdug kun 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho stong gyur cig /
